Steam (ST): ......I didn't recognize his face, but judging by his clothes, I guessed he was a servant of the Ushiromiya Head Household.

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "Welcome home, Milady. You were so late in returning that I began to worry."
Umineko Project (UP): "Welcome home, Milady. You were quite late, and I began to worry."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Welcome home, Milady. You were quite late, and I began to worry."
PC Japanese (JP): 「お嬢様、お帰りなさいませ。だいぶ遅かったので心配いたしておりました。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お嬢様、お帰りなさいませ。だいぶ遅かったので心配しておりました」
Russian (RU): "Добро пожаловать домой, миледи. Вы припозднились, и я уже начал беспокоиться."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem‐vinda de volta, ojou‐sama. Você estava demorando, então eu comecei a ficar preocupado."
Vietnamese (VI): "Chào mừng tiểu thư trở về nhà. Cô về trễ quá, làm tôi lo lắng rồi đó."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「小姐，歡迎回來。比預定的時間晚了不少，鄙人甚是擔心。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「小姐，欢迎回来。比预定的时间晚了不少，鄙人甚是担心。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Selamat datang pulang, Nyonya. Kalian cukup terlambat, aku mulai khawatir."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Bentornata a casa, Milady. Eravate in ritardo, cominciavo a preoccuparmi."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Bentornata a casa, signorina. Ero in pensiero per lei, visto il vostro notevole ritardo."
Turkish (TR): "Leydim, evinize hoş geldiniz. Oldukça geç kaldınız, endişelenmeye başlamıştım."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "Ah, thanks for caring! This moron got so scared, we had to slow down. It was seriously annoying!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Ah, thanks for caring! The boat had Battler scared shitless. So we had to slow down for him. Seriously, what a pain in the ass!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ah, thanks for caring! This moron got so scared that we had to slow down. It was seriously annoying!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん、心配ありがと！　ウドの大木が怖がっちゃってよー。それで徐行運転だったってわけ。マジでうぜーぜ！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん、心配ありがと！　戦人のヤツが怖がっちゃってよー。それで徐行運転だったってわけ。マジでうぜーぜ！」
Russian (RU): "Ах, спасибо за заботу! Этот придурок так испугался, что пришлось сбавить скорость. Это здорово раздражало!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ah, obrigada por se preocupar! Esse idiota ficou superassustado com o barco. Então tivemos que diminuir a velocidade para ele. Sério, isso foi um saco!"
Vietnamese (VI): "Ưm, cảm ơn vì đã lo cho tôi nhé! Chiếc thuyền làm Battler sợ vãi cả linh hồn ra. Cho nên tụi tôi phải đi chậm lại vì em ấy đó. Thật là phiền phức chết đi được!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯，讓你擔心真是不好意思！都是因為戰人那傢伙怕得不行。結果就變成這樣小心慢行嘞。真是煩死嘞！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯，让你担心真是不好意思！都是因为战人那家伙怕得不行。结果就变成这样小心慢行嘞。真是烦死嘞！」
Indonesian (IDN): "Ah, terima kasih sudah peduli! Battler ketakutan setengah mati di kapal. Jadi kami harus memperlambat untuknya. Sungguh menyebalkan!"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ah, grazie del pensiero! Questo idiota qui era tutto impaurito e abbiamo avuto un rallentamento. È stato davvero seccante!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ah, grazie per il pensiero! Questo scemone quaggiù ha avuto un attacco di fifa,{n}quindi abbiamo dovuto rallentare. Seriamente, che rottura!"
Turkish (TR): "İlgilendiğin için teşekkürler! Tekne Battler'ı çok korkuttu. Onun için yavaşlamak zorunda kaldık. Cidden, ne baş belası ama!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "S, shut up...someday, when the shoe's on the other foot, you'll remember this, ...ugghh."

Steam (ST): At this rate, word'll spread to the whole family, and I'll be the big conversation piece during dinner.
Umineko Project (UP): At this rate, the word'll spread around the entire family, and I'll become the big conversation piece during dinner.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At this rate, the word'll spread around the entire family and I'll become the big conversation piece during dinner.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この調子じゃ、親族中に言いふらされて、今日の晩餐は俺の話題で持ちきりだな。

Steam (ST): Even without this, everyone'd be talking about me because of that six year gap, ...but now I've given them an even juicier topic...!
Umineko Project (UP): Even without this, everyone'd be talking about me because of that six‐year gap...but now I've provided them with an even juicier topic...!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even without this, everyone'd be talking about me because of that six year gap...but now I've given them an even juicier topic...!
PC Japanese (JP): ただでさえ６年ぶりってことで話題にされやすいってのに、さらに美味しい話題まで提供しちまうとは…！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ただでさえ６年ぶりってことで話題にされやすいってのに、さらに美味しい話題まで提供しちまうとは…！
Russian (RU): Даже без этого я был бы у них на устах ввиду своего шестилетнего отсутствия, но теперь им предоставилась ещё более сочная тема!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Apesar que mesmo sem isso, todos vão estar falando a respeito de mim por causa dos meus seis anos sem aparecer... mas agora eu acabei dando a eles um assunto ainda melhor...!
Vietnamese (VI): Chỉ riêng việc vắng mặt sáu năm đã đủ khiến họ xì xào rồi... mà nay tôi còn tự vẽ ra thêm cái chuyện "hấp dẫn" như vậy nữa...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 本來就因為是相隔六年而容易變成他們的談資，現在又變本加厲地提供了這麼令人愉快的話題，真是失策…！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 本来就因为是相隔六年而容易变成他们的谈资，现在又变本加厉地提供了这么令人愉快的话题，真是失策…！
Indonesian (IDN): Bahkan tanpa ini, semua orang pasti sudah membicarakanku karena jarak enam tahun itu...tapi sekarang aku malah memberi mereka topik yang lebih menarik...!
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E se non fosse così, sarebbe facile per me essere sulle labbra di tutti dato che sono passati sei anni, ma ora gli ho concesso un argomento anche più succoso...!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Già il solo fatto che non venivo da sei anni mi rendeva facilmente oggetto di discussione, ma ora gli avevo dato una questione ancor più succosa...!
Turkish (TR): Bu olmasa bile, altı yıllık yokluğum nedeniyle herkes benden bahsedecekti...ama şimdi onlara daha da sulu bir konu verdim...!

Steam (ST): Dammit, why does the Ushiromiya Head Family have to live on this isolated island?!
Umineko Project (UP): Dammit, why does the Ushiromiya main family have to live on this isolated island!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Dammit, why does the Ushiromiya head house have to live on this isolated island!

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 畜生、何で右代宮本家は離島なんかに住んでんだー！

Vietnamese (VI): Chết tiệt, tại sao nhánh chính của gia tộc Ushiromiya lại phải sống trên cái hòn đảo hẻo lánh này chứ!

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dannazione, perché mai la famiglia Ushiromiya doveva vivere su quest'isola remota?!

Steam (ST): In the meantime, the boat had finished its mooring. A small plank was lowered so that we could get down.

Umineko Project (UP): "You must all be quite tired from your long trip. Madam, please, allow me to assist you."

Umineko Project (UP): "You do me too much honor. Please allow me to assist you, Hideyoshi‐sama."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "You do me too much honor. Please allow me to assist you, Hideyoshi-sama."
PC Japanese (JP): 「これは身に余る光栄です。どうぞお手を、秀吉さま。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「これは身に余る光栄です。どうぞお手を、秀吉さま」
Russian (RU): "Вы оказываете мне слишком большую честь. Пожалуйста, разрешите мне помочь вам, Хидэёши‐сама."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É uma honra ouvir isso. Por favor, me permita ajudá‐lo, Hideyoshi‐sama."
Vietnamese (VI): "Ngài khen quá lời rồi ạ. Xin để tôi được giúp đỡ, thưa ngài Hideyoshi."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「您的話令鄙人無比光榮。請把手給鄙人，秀吉先生。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「您的话令鄙人无比光荣。请把手给鄙人，秀吉先生。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Kau terlalu memujiku. Izinkan aku membantumu, Hideyoshi-sama."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mi fa molto onore. Permettetemi di aiutarla, Hideyoshi-sama."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Lei mi offre lodi che non mi merito. Mi permetta di aiutarla, signor Hideyoshi."
Turkish (TR): "Beni çok onurlandırıyorsunuz. Lütfen size yardımcı olmama izin verin, Hideyoshi-sama."

Steam (ST): Gohda-san then lent a hand to everyone as they disembarked, greeting them as they passed.
Umineko Project (UP): Gohda‐san then lent a hand to everyone as they disembarked, greeting them as they passed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san then lent a hand to everyone as they disembarked, greeting them as they passed.
PC Japanese (JP): 郷田さんは、その後も全員の下船を補助して挨拶をしていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 郷田さんは、その後も全員の下船を補助して挨拶をしていた。
Russian (RU): Затем Года‐сан помог всем сойти с катера, здороваясь с каждым.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Gohda‐san estendeu a mão para cada um que desembarcava, cumprimentando todos que passavam.
Vietnamese (VI): Chú Gohda sau đó giúp từng người xuống thuyền, chào hỏi họ khi họ đi qua.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 之後，鄉田也協助所有人下了船，並一一打了招呼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 之后，乡田也协助所有人下了船，并一一打了招呼。
Indonesian (IDN): Gohda-san kemudian membantu semua orang turun, menyapa mereka satu per satu.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gohda-san assistette lo sbarco di ognuno, accogliendoli.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopodiché Gouda-san accolse tutti i presenti, assistendoli nello sbarco.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san daha sonra gemiden inen herkese elini uzattı ve yanlarından geçerken onları karşıladı.

Steam (ST): His speech and mannerisms had the refined polish of a professional.
Umineko Project (UP): His speech and mannerisms had the refined polish of a professional.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): His speech and mannerisms had the refined polish of a professional.
PC Japanese (JP): 挨拶や仕草が洗練されていて、何と言うか、プロの身のこなしだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 挨拶や仕草が洗練されていて、何と言うか、プロの身のこなしだ。
Russian (RU): Его речь и манеры обладали изысканным блеском профессионализма.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua forma de falar e as suas boas maneiras são refinadas como a de um profissional.
Vietnamese (VI): Cách nói năng và thái độ của chú ấy có sự trau chuốt và tinh tế theo một cách rất chuyên nghiệp.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他的一言一行都仿佛經過千錘百鍊，怎麼說呢，不愧是專業的啊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他的一言一行都仿佛经过千锤百炼，怎么说呢，不愧是专业的啊。
Indonesian (IDN): Cara bicara dan sikapnya menunjukkan kehalusan seorang profesional.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il suo portamento, come si presentava, era raffinato e, come dire, proprio con uno stile professionale.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il suo vocabolario e il suo portamento erano sofisticati e, come potrei dirlo, conformi ad un professionista.
Turkish (TR): Konuşması ve tavırları bir profesyonelin rafine cilasına sahipti.

Steam (ST): He was very graceful, in contrast with his initially tough-looking appearance.
Umineko Project (UP): He was very graceful, in contrast with his initially rough‐looking appearance.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He was very graceful, in contrast with his initially rough-looking appearance.
PC Japanese (JP): 見かけのゴツさの割りにとても優雅だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 見かけのゴツさの割りにとても優雅だった。
Russian (RU): Он был очень грациозен, в противоположность своему первоначально грубоватому виду.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele é muito educado, o que contrasta com a sua aparência inicial de parecer rude.
Vietnamese (VI): Chú Gohda rất thanh lịch, trái ngược hoàn toàn với vẻ ngoài có phần thô kệch ban đầu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與強壯的外表相反，言行非常優雅。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与强壮的外表相反，言行非常优雅。
Indonesian (IDN): Dia sangat anggun, bertolak belakang dengan penampilannya yang awalnya terkesan kasar.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era davvero molto elegante, in contrasto con il suo robusto aspetto esteriore.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In contrasto con le sue apparenze da omaccione, era una persona di gran classe.
Turkish (TR): Başlangıçtaki kaba görünümünün aksine çok zarifti.

Steam (ST): His large size made him seem a bit scary at first, but he was much more polite than my first impression had led me to believe.
Umineko Project (UP): His large size made him seem a bit scary at first, but he was much more polite than my first impression of him had led me to believe.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): His large size made him seem a bit scary at first, but he was much more polite than my first impression of him had led me to believe.
PC Japanese (JP): 大男特有の威圧感があるので怖い人かと思っていたが、想像するよりずっと礼儀正しい人だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 大男特有の威圧感があるので怖い人かと思っていたが、想像するよりずっと礼儀正しい人だ。
Russian (RU): Сначала он показался мне страшным из‐за его больших размеров, однако он был намного более обходителен в сравнении с моими первыми впечатлениями.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O fato dele ser bem grande o torna um pouco assustador à primeira vista, mas ele é muito mais educado do que a minha primeira impressão me levou a acreditar.
Vietnamese (VI): Vóc dáng to lớn khiến chú có vẻ hơi đáng sợ lúc đầu, nhưng chú ấy lại lịch sự hơn nhiều so với ấn tượng đầu tiên của tôi.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為帶著大個子特有的壓迫感，所以我本以為是個可怕的人，沒想到他比我想像的有禮儀多了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为带着大个子特有的压迫感，所以我本以为是个可怕的人，没想到他比我想象的有礼仪多了。
Indonesian (IDN): Tubuhnya yang besar membuatnya terlihat menakutkan pada awalnya, tapi dia jauh lebih sopan dari kesan pertamaku.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Vista la sua travolgente qualità, cosa comune tra omoni come lui, pensavo fosse una persona sinistra, ma fu sorprendentemente raffinato tutto il tempo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La sua stazza intimidatoria mi aveva messo in soggezione, ma era molto più cordiale di quanto avessi immaginato.
Turkish (TR): İri cüssesi ilk başta biraz korkutucu görünmesine neden olsa da, ilk izlenimime göre çok daha kibardı.

Steam (ST): He claimed to have served on the island for two years, but he had doubtless worked at a similar job somewhere before.
Umineko Project (UP): He claimed to have served on the island for two years, but he had doubtless worked at a similar job somewhere before.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He claimed to have served on the island for two years, but he had doubtless worked at a similar job somewhere before.
PC Japanese (JP): 勤めて２年と言ってるが、その前にもどこかで同じような職だったに違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 勤めて２年と言ってるが、その前にもどこかで同じような職だったに違いない。
Russian (RU): Он сказал, что работал на острове два года, но не было никаких сомнений, что прежде ему доводилось заниматься подобной работой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele disse ter começado a trabalhar nesta ilha dois anos atrás, mas sem dúvida, ele já trabalhou em algum outro lugar semelhante antes.
Vietnamese (VI): Chú Gohda nói đã phục vụ trên đảo được hai năm, nhưng chắc chắn đã từng làm công việc tương tự ở đâu đó trước đó.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說他自稱在島上工作了兩年，不過想必以前也從事過類似的工作。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说他自称在岛上工作了两年，不过想必以前也从事过类似的工作。
Indonesian (IDN): Dia mengaku sudah bekerja di pulau ini selama dua tahun, tapi pasti dia pernah bekerja di pekerjaan serupa sebelumnya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Disse che lavorava sull'isola da due anni, ma si capiva che aveva lavorato nello stesso settore, precedentemente.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Disse che lavorava qui da due anni, ma non c'era alcun dubbio che in passato avesse svolto impieghi dello stesso tipo.
Turkish (TR): Adada iki yıldır görev yaptığını iddia ediyordu ama şüphesiz daha önce de benzer bir işte çalışmıştı.

Steam (ST): After everybody disembarked, the mooring rope was untied and the boat started to steer away from the harbor.
Umineko Project (UP): After everybody disembarked, the mooring rope was untied, and the boat started to steer away from the harbor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After everybody disembarked, the mooring rope was untied and the boat started to steer away from the harbor.
PC Japanese (JP): 全員が下船すると、舫い綱は解かれ、船は船着場を離れ始める。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 全員が下船すると、舫い綱は解かれ、船は船着場を離れ始める。
Russian (RU): После того, как все покинули борт, швартовые были отданы, и катер стал выплывать из гавани.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois que todos desembarcaram, a corda usada para ancorar o barco foi desamarrada e o barco começou a se afastar do atracadouro.
Vietnamese (VI): Sau khi mọi người đã lên bờ, dây neo được tháo ra, và con thuyền bắt đầu rời khỏi bến.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在所有人下船之後，船員解開了纜繩，船漂離碼頭緩緩遠去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在所有人下船之后，船员解开了缆绳，船漂离码头缓缓远去。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah semua orang turun, tali tambat dilepas, dan kapal mulai menjauh dari pelabuhan.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo che tutti furono scesi, la corda per l'ormeggio venne sciolta e la barca cominciò ad allontanarsi dal porto.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopo che tutti scesero dal battello, la corda per l'ormeggio venne sciolta, e la barca cominciò ad allontanarsi dal porto.
Turkish (TR): Herkes karaya çıktıktan sonra bağlama halatı çözüldü ve tekne limandan uzaklaşmaya başladı.

Steam (ST): It was probably returning to its home port on Niijima.
Umineko Project (UP): It was probably returning to its home port of Niijima.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was probably returning to its home port of Niijima.
PC Japanese (JP): 新島の母港へ引き上げるのだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 新島の母港へ引き上げるのだろう。
Russian (RU): Скорее всего, он возвратится обратно в порт Нииджимы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele provavelmente está retornando para o porto de Niijima.
Vietnamese (VI): Có lẽ nó đang trở về cảng chính ở Niijima.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可能是要返回新島的母港吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可能是要返回新岛的母港吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Mungkin akan kembali ke pelabuhan asalnya di Niijima.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Stava probabilmente tornando al porto principale di Niijima.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Probabilmente sarebbe ritornata al porto di Niijima.
Turkish (TR): Muhtemelen ana limanı olan Niijima'ya dönüyordu.

Steam (ST): The captain waved his hand in farewell. Maria conscientiously waved her hand back.
Umineko Project (UP): The captain waved his hand in farewell.{n}Maria conscientiously waved back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The captain waved his hand in farewell. Maria conscientiously waved her hand back.
PC Japanese (JP): 船長がお別れの手を振ってくれる。真里亞も律儀に手を振り返していた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 船長がお別れの手を振ってくれる。{n}真里亞も律儀に手を振り返していた。
Russian (RU): На прощанье капитан помахал нам рукой.{n}Мария добросовестно помахала ему в ответ.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O capitão se despediu acenando para nós.{n}Maria conscientemente acenou de volta.
Vietnamese (VI): Thuyền trưởng vẫy tay chào tạm biệt.{n}Maria nhiệt tình vẫy tay đáp lại.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 船長揮舞著手臂向我們告別。{n}真里亞也禮貌地揮起了手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 船长挥舞着手臂向我们告别。{n}真里亚也礼貌地挥起了手。
Indonesian (IDN): Nahkodanya melambaikan tangan.{n}Maria dengan sungguh-sungguh membalasnya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il capitano salutò da lontano. Maria lo risalutò coscienziosamente.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il capitano agitò la mano per salutarci. Anche Maria ricambiò il gesto con premura.
Turkish (TR): Kaptan veda etmek için elini salladı.{n}Maria bilinçli olarak el salladı.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "............Hmmm, now that I think about it, that must be why I've felt something out of place for a while now. I can't hear the cries of the seagulls."
Umineko Project (UP): "............Hmmm, I just realized why something's been feeling out of place to me. I can't hear the cries of the seagulls."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............Hmmm, now that I think about it, that must be why I've felt something out of place for a while now. I can't hear the cries of the seagulls."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………ん〜、何だかさっきから違和感があると思ったら、あれだな。うみねこの声を聞いてないぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………ん〜、何だかさっきから違和感があると思ったら、あれだな。うみねこの声を聞いてないぜ」
Russian (RU): "............Хм‐м, вот оно что, вот почему я чувствовал, что что‐то не так всё это время. Я не слышу криков чаек."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Hmmm, acabei de perceber o porquê de eu estar achando que falta alguma coisa aqui. Eu não consigo ouvir o pipilar das gaivotas."
Vietnamese (VI): "............Hmm, em vừa nhận ra vì sao em thấy có gì đó lạ lạ. Em không nghe thấy tiếng hải âu."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………嗯～，從剛才就覺得有點啥不對勁，原來是那個啊。聽不到{c:86EF9C:海貓}的鳴叫聲啊。{c:86EF9C:（詳見魔導書“鳥類相關”條目）}」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………嗯～，从刚才就觉得有点啥不对劲，原来是那个啊。听不到{c:86EF9C:海猫}的鸣叫声啊。{c:86EF9C:（详见魔导书“鸟类相关”条目）}」
Indonesian (IDN): "............Hmmm, baru aku sadar ada yang terasa aneh. Aku tidak mendengar suara burung camar."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Mmmh, ora che ci penso, mi sono sentito tutto strano per un po', e dev'essere per quello. Non sento il rumore dei gabbiani."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Mmmh, già da prima sentivo che ci fosse qualcosa fuori posto, ed ecco cos'era: non si sentono le grida dei gabbiani."
Turkish (TR): "............Hmmm, bir şeylerin neden bana yabancı geldiğini şimdi anladım. Martıların ağlamalarını duyamıyorum."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "Seagulls? The birds?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Seagulls? The birds?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Seagulls? The birds?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うみねこぉ？　鳥のか？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うみねこぉ？　鳥のか？」
Russian (RU): "Чаек? Птиц?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Gaivotas? Os pássaros?"
Vietnamese (VI): "Hải âu á? Mấy con chim ấy à?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「海貓？是說鳥嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「海猫？是说鸟吗？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Burung camar? Burungnya?"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "I gabbiani? Intendi gli uccelli?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "I gabbiani? Intendi gli uccelli?"
Turkish (TR): "Martılar mı? Kuşlar mı?"

Steam (ST): If I remember correctly, whenever we came to this island in the past, the seagulls always greeted us with their lively "nyaa nyaa" cries.
Umineko Project (UP): I remember that whenever we came to this island, the seagulls always welcomed us with their lively "nyaa nyaa" cries.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It's true that whenever I come to this island, the seagulls always meet us with their lively 'nyaa nyaa' cries.
PC Japanese (JP): この島に来るといつも、うみねこがにゃあにゃあと賑やかな声で迎えてくれたんだっけ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この島に来るといつも、うみねこがにゃあにゃあと賑やかな声で迎えてくれたんだっけ。
Russian (RU): Каждый раз, когда я приезжал на остров, чайки встречали нас своими оживленными криками.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu me lembro de que sempre que eu vinha para esta ilha, as gaivotas nos davam as boas‐vindas com seus alegres "nyaa nyaa".
Vietnamese (VI): Tôi nhớ rằng mỗi khi đến hòn đảo này, bầy hải âu luôn chào đón chúng tôi bằng những tiếng kêu "nyaa nyaa" rộn ràng.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我記得每次來到這個島，都能聽到海貓發出“喵啊喵啊”的熱烈鳴叫聲，迎接我們的來臨。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我记得每次来到这个岛，都能听到海猫发出“喵啊喵啊”的热烈鸣叫声，迎接我们的来临。
Indonesian (IDN): Aku ingat setiap kali datang ke pulau ini, burung camar selalu menyambut kami dengan suara "nyaa nyaa" mereka yang riuh.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ogni volta che vengo su quest'isola, i gabbiani ci accolgono sempre con quei loro caratteristici "nyaa nyaa".
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ogni volta che venivo su quest'isola, i gabbiani mi accoglievano con quei loro ‘nyaa, nyaa’ squillanti.
Turkish (TR): Bu adaya ne zaman gelsek martıların bizi hep canlı "nyaa nyaa" çığlıklarıyla karşıladıklarını hatırlıyorum.

Steam (ST): Because of that, whenever I hear the cries of seagulls anywhere else, I get the feeling that I'm coming to a family conference.
Umineko Project (UP): And because of that, whenever I hear the cries of the seagulls in any other place, I get the feeling that I've come to a family conference.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And because of that, whenever I hear the cries of the seagulls in any other place, I get the feeling that I'm coming to a family conference.
PC Japanese (JP): そのせいで、ここ以外でうみねこの声を聞いても、親族会議に来ているような気分になる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そのせいで、ここ以外でうみねこの声を聞いても、親族会議に来ているような気分になる。
Russian (RU): Из‐за этого каждый раз, когда я слышу крики чаек где‐нибудь ещё, мне кажется, что я приехал на семейное совещание.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E por causa disso, sempre que eu ouço o pipilar de uma gaivota em qualquer outro lugar, eu tenho o sentimento de que estou na conferência de família.
Vietnamese (VI): Vì vậy, mỗi khi nghe tiếng hải âu ở nơi khác, tôi lại có cảm giác như mình đang ở buổi họp mặt gia đình mình.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 正因如此，即使是在其它地方聽到了海貓們的鳴叫聲，我也會有一種來參加親族會議一樣的感覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 正因如此，即使是在其它地方听到了海猫们的鸣叫声，我也会有一种来参加亲族会议一样的感觉。
Indonesian (IDN): Dan karena itu, setiap kali mendengar suara burung camar di tempat lain, aku merasa seperti sedang menuju konferensi keluarga.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E perciò, ogni qualvolta sento quei versi in altri posti, ho la sensazione che sto andando ad una conferenza di famiglia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per questo motivo, anche quando sentuvo questi versi altrove, avevo come la sensazione di star andando ad una riunione di famiglia.
Turkish (TR): Ve bu yüzden ne zaman başka bir yerde martıların çığlıklarını duysam, bir aile konferansına gelmişim hissine kapılırım.

Steam (ST): Except for the small part of the island where those of the Ushiromiya Head Family live,  Rokkenjima has been left uncultivated, which apparently makes it a paradise for wild birds.
Umineko Project (UP): Except for the small part of the island where those of the Ushiromiya head house live, Rokkenjima had been left uncultivated, apparently transforming into a paradise for wild birds.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Except for the small part of the island where those of the Ushiromiya head house live, Rokkenjima had been left uncultivated, apparently transforming into a paradise for wild birds.
PC Japanese (JP): 六軒島は、右代宮本家が住んでいる極めて一部分以外は、手付かずで放置されているため、野鳥の天国になっているらしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 六軒島は、右代宮本家が住んでいる極めて一部分以外は、手付かずで放置されているため、野鳥の天国になっているらしい。
Russian (RU): За исключением небольшой части острова, занимаемой головным домом Уширомия, Роккенджима, не тронутая рукой человека, определённо превратилась в рай для диких птиц.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Exceto pela pequena parte da ilha onde fica a casa em que o chefe da família Ushiromiya vive, Rokkenjima foi mantida intocada, aparentemente transformando ela em um paraíso para pássaros selvagens.
Vietnamese (VI): Ngoại trừ phần nhỏ của đảo nơi nhà chính của gia tộc Ushiromiya sinh sống, Rokkenjima gần như bị bỏ hoang, trở thành thiên đường cho những loài chim hoang dã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 六軒島除了右代宮本家所居住的極小一部分外，其它地方都沒有被開發過，因此似乎都成了野鳥的天堂。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 六轩岛除了右代宫本家所居住的极小一部分外，其它地方都没有被开发过，因此似乎都成了野鸟的天堂。
Indonesian (IDN): Kecuali bagian kecil pulau yang dihuni keluarga utama Ushiromiya, Rokkenjima dibiarkan tak terurus, tampaknya berubah menjadi surga bagi burung liar.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Eccetto per la piccola parte dove giace la Villa Ushiromiya, Rokkenjima, sembrava essere un paradiso di uccelli selvatici, siccome fu lasciata intatta.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dato che l'isola di Rokkenjima era rimasta intatta, ad eccezione di una minuscola porzione in cui abitava la famiglia Ushiromiya, si diceva che essa fosse un paradiso per gli uccelli selvatici.
Turkish (TR): Adanın Ushiromiya baş ailesinin yaşadığı küçük bir bölümü dışında, Rokkenjima'ya hiç ellenmemiş ve görünüşe göre yabani kuşlar için bir cennete dönüşmüş.

Steam (ST): Supposedly, there was a cliff somewhere that housed a huge seagull colony, so this island was always full of seagulls.
Umineko Project (UP): Seemingly, some cliff face or other had become home to a huge seagull colony, and so this island was always full of them.

PC Japanese (JP): どっかの岸壁がうみねこの巨大コロニーになってるらしく、この島はいつもはうみねこだらけなのだ。

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "That's not it, Maria-chan. I've heard wild birds are attuned to changes in the weather and atmospheric pressure. The weather will probably get worse tonight. The seagulls might've returned to their nests early."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's not it, Maria‐chan. I've heard that wild birds are attuned to changes in the weather and atmospheric pressure. And it looks like the weather will get worse around tonight. It's possible they hurried back to their nests."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's not it, Maria-chan. It seems that wild birds are attuned to changes in the weather and atmospheric pressure. It looks like the weather will get worse around tonight. It's possible they hurried back to their nests."
PC Japanese (JP): 「違うよ、真里亞ちゃん。野鳥って天気や気圧の変化に敏感なんだそうだよ。今夜辺り、天気が崩れそうだしね。巣へ早めに引き上げてるのかもしれないね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「違うよ、真里亞ちゃん。野鳥って天気や気圧の変化に敏感なんだそうだよ。今夜辺り、天気が崩れそうだしね。巣へ早めに引き上げてるのかもしれないね」
Russian (RU): "Это не так, Мария‐чан. Похоже, птицы настроены на перемены погоды и атмосферного давления. По‐видимому, ближе к вечеру погода должна ухудшиться. Так что, вероятно, что они поторопились вернуться в свои гнёзда."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não foi isso, Maria‐chan. Eu ouvi dizer que as aves selvagens estão sintonizadas com o tempo e a pressão atmosférica. E parece que o tempo vai ficar ainda pior essa noite. É possível que elas tenham voltado correndo para os seus ninhos."
Vietnamese (VI): "Không phải vậy đâu, Maria à. Anh nghe nói rằng những loài chim hoang dã rất nhạy cảm với những thay đổi của thời tiết và áp suất không khí. Và có vẻ như thời tiết sẽ xấu đi vào tối nay. Có thể chúng đã vội vàng trở về tổ rồi."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不是哦，小真里亞。我聽說野鳥對天氣和氣壓的變化是很敏感的哦。這天氣看起來會在今晚轉壞。海貓們說不定都早早地歸巢了吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不是哦，小真里亚。我听说野鸟对天气和气压的变化是很敏感的哦。这天气看起来会在今晚转坏。海猫们说不定都早早地归巢了吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Bukan begitu, Maria-chan. Kudengar burung liar peka terhadap perubahan cuaca dan tekanan atmosfer. Dan sepertinya cuaca akan memburuk nanti malam. Mungkin mereka buru-buru kembali ke sarangnya."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non è così, Maria-chan. Sembra che quegli uccelli selvatici siano in sintonia con i cambiamenti temporali e della pressione atmosferica. Probabilmente stasera il tempo peggiorerà. È possibile che siano tornati ai loro nidi."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Non è così, Maria-chan. Pare che gli uccelli selvatici siano sensibili ai cambiamenti metereologici e della pressione atmosferica. Probabilmente stasera il tempo peggiorerà. Può essere che siano tornati ai loro nidi prima del solito."
Turkish (TR): "Öyle değil, Maria-chan. Yabani kuşların hava ve atmosfer basıncındaki değişikliklere uyum sağladığını duymuştum. Ve görünüşe göre hava bu gece daha da kötüleşecek. Aceleyle yuvalarına dönmüş olabilirler."

Vietnamese (VI): "Ừ ừ, đúng đó, đúng đó. Những gì anh George nói đều là sự thật. Thời tiết xấu nên có thể chúng đã về nhà rồi. Điều đó không có nghĩa là chúng đã biến mất, phải không nè? Đúng không, cô nhỉ?!"

Indonesian (IDN): "Yaaa, benar, benar. Apa yang dikatakan George-aniki benar. Cuacanya buruk jadi mungkin mereka pulang untuk hari ini. Bukan berarti mereka hilang, kan? Benar kan, Bibi?!"

Turkish (TR): "Eveet, bu doğru, bu doğru. George-aniki'nin dediği doğru. Hava kötü olduğu için muhtemelen bugün eve gittiler. Bu tamamen gittikleri anlamına gelmez, değil mi? Değil mi, teyze?!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "That's right. Tomorrow, when the weather gets better, I'm sure they'll come back so we can hear them cry "myaa myaa" like they always do."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's right. Tomorrow, when the weather gets better, I'm sure they'll come back and let you hear their "myaa myaa" cries."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's right. Tomorrow, when the weather gets better, I'm sure they'll come back and let us hear their 'Myaa myaa' cries."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうよ。明日以降、天気が良くなったらきっと戻ってきて、みゃーみゃーと声を聞かせてくれるわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうよ。明日以降、天気が良くなったらきっと戻ってきて、みゃーみゃーと声を聞かせてくれるわ」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说得对。如果明天之后天气变好了，那它们肯定会回来的，到那时又可以听到“咪啊咪啊”的叫声了哦。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Benar. Besok, saat cuaca membaik, aku yakin mereka akan kembali dan memperdengarkan suara "myaa myaa" mereka."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hai ragione. Domani, quando il tempo migliorerà, sono sicura che torneranno indietro e ci faranno sentire il loro ‘nyaa nyaa. ’
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Hai ragione. Se domani il tempo sarà migliorato, ritorneranno sicuramente, e ci faranno sentire il loro ‘nyaa nyaa’."
Turkish (TR): "Evet, doğru. Yarın hava düzeldiğinde eminim geri gelecekler ve "myaa myaa" çığlıklarını duymana izin verecekler."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「譲治くんは小さい子の面倒を見るのがうまいわね。保育士さんでも勤められるんじゃない？」
Russian (RU): "У тебя здорово получается заботиться о детях. Тебе бы воспитателем работать!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "George‐kun, você é incrível lidando com crianças. Você poderia trabalhar cuidando de crianças!"
Vietnamese (VI): "George à, cháu thật sự rất giỏi trong việc chăm sóc trẻ con đấy. Cô nghĩ cháu có thể làm trong ngành giáo dục mầm non luôn cơ!"

Turkish (TR): "George-kun, çocuklarla ilgilenme konusunda çok iyisin. Bence çocuk bakımında çalışabilirsin!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "Yeah, it's almost like George nii-san was born to do something like that. Personally, I think that'd suit you better than doing business in some company president's office."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah, it's like you were born to do that. To me, that seems more "you" than doing business in some company president office."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yeah, George nii-san, looks like it's what you were born to do. Personally, I see you doing that rather than doing business in some company president's office."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あー、譲治兄さんの天職っぽいぜ。私的には社長室でビジネスってより、そっちの方が兄さんのイメージだぜ？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あー、譲治兄さんの天職っぽいぜ。私的には社長室でビジネスってより、そっちの方が兄さんのイメージだぜ？」
Russian (RU): "Да уж, Джордж нии‐сан, ты будто рождён для такой работы. По мне, тебе это больше подходит, чем заниматься коммерцией в каком‐нибудь президентском офисе."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, é como se você tivesse nascido pra isso. Para mim, isso parece mais "você" do que trabalhar como presidente no escritório de alguma empresa."
Vietnamese (VI): "Đúng đó, cứ như là anh sinh ra để làm việc đó vậy. Với em thì công việc đó hợp với anh hơn là làm giám đốc ở công ty nào đó đấy."

Indonesian (IDN): "Ya, itu tampak seperti kau dilahirkan untuk itu. Bagiku, sepertinya itu lebih "cocok" untukmu daripada bekerja di kantor presiden perusahaan."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ah, George nii-san, sembra proprio tu sia nato per questo. Personalmente, ti ci vedo lì, invece di fare affari in qualche ufficio da presidente di una compagnia."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Steam (ST): "You really are modest, George-kun. But Battler-kun is quite good with children too! Just a second ago, even though it didn't last long, Maria seemed to be having a lot of fun. Please, keep on playing with her like you did just now. Just choose your jokes more carefully, okay? *giggle*."
Umineko Project (UP): "You're truly modest, George‐kun. But Battler‐kun, you're quite good with children too, you know! Earlier, even if it was just for a time, Maria seemed to be having a lot of fun. Keep on playing with her like you did just now. Just choose the jokes carefully though, alright? *giggle*."

PC Japanese (JP): 「本当に譲治くんは謙虚ね。でも、戦人くんも子供のあやし方が上手よ？　さっきはほんの少しの間だけど、真里亞、とっても楽しそうだった。これからも今みたいに遊んであげてね。冗談は選んで、だけどね？　くす。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「本当に譲治くんは謙虚ね。でも、戦人くんも子供のあやし方が上手よ？　さっきはほんの少しの間だけど、真里亞、とっても楽しそうだった。これからも今みたいに遊んであげてね。冗談は選んで、だけどね？　くす」
Russian (RU): "Ты воистину скромный человек, Джордж‐кун. Но Баттлер‐кун, ты ведь тоже хорошо ладишь с детьми! Только что, пусть и недолгое время, Марии было очень весело. Продолжайте и дальше так играть с ней. Только с шутками поаккуратней, хорошо? Хи‐хи."

Pouco antes, mesmo que por pouco tempo, a Maria parecia estar se divertindo muito. Continue brincando com ela como você fez há pouco. Só escolha as suas piadas com mais cuidado, certo? *risos*."
Vietnamese (VI): "Cháu thật sự khiêm tốn quá, George ạ. Nhưng mà Battler này, cháu cũng giỏi chơi với trẻ con phết nhé! Khi nãy thôi, dù chỉ được một lúc, nhưng mà Maria trông rất vui đó. Hãy tiếp tục chơi với con bé như lúc nãy nhé. Chỉ là, hãy đùa sao cho phù hợp hơn, được chứ? *cười khúc khích*."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「讓治君真的好謙虛啊。不過戰人君哄小孩的方式也挺高明哦？雖然剛才只是陪了她一小段時間，但真里亞看起來玩得好開心呢。今後也拜託你像現在這樣跟她玩哦。只不過，玩笑要有選擇性地開喲。呵呵。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「让治君真的好谦虚啊。不过战人君哄小孩的方式也挺高明哦？虽然刚才只是陪了她一小段时间，但真里亚看起来玩得好开心呢。今后也拜托你像现在这样跟她玩哦。只不过，玩笑要有选择性地开哟。呵呵。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Kau benar-benar rendah hati, George-kun. Tapi Battler-kun, kau juga cukup baik dengan anak-anak! Barusan, meski hanya sebentar, Maria terlihat sangat senang. Teruslah bermain dengannya seperti tadi. Tapi lebih hati-hati memilih candaan, oke? *cekikikan*."

Prima, anche se solo per un attimo, Maria sembrava davvero divertirsi con lui. Continua a giocare con lei proprio come hai fatto poco fa. Solo, scegli gli scherzi attentamente, ok? *giggle*"

Un attimo fa Maria sembrava divertirsi un mondo, anche se per poco tempo. Continua a giocare con lei come hai fatto finora. Però scegli meglio le tue battute, ok? Uhuhuh."

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san called to everyone and started leading us. Kumasawa-san brought up the rear.
PC Japanese (JP): 郷田さんが全員に呼びかけ、先導を始める。熊沢さんはしんがりだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 郷田さんが全員に呼びかけ、先導を始める。{n}熊沢さんはしんがりだった。
Russian (RU): Обратился ко всем Года и повёл нас.{n}Кумасава‐сан замыкала шествие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Gohda‐san chamou a todos e começou a nos guiar.{n}A Kumasawa‐san nos acompanhou, indo por último.
Vietnamese (VI): Chú Gohda gọi mọi người và bắt đầu dẫn đường.{n}Bà Kumasawa thì đi ở phía sau cùng.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田向大家如此喊道，並開始帶路。{n}隊伍由熊澤婆婆殿後。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 乡田向大家如此喊道，并开始带路。{n}队伍由熊泽婆婆殿后。
Indonesian (IDN): Gohda-san memanggil semua orang dan mulai memandu kami.{n}Kumasawa-san berada di barisan belakang.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gohda-san chiamò tutti e ci fece strada. Kumasawa-san chiuse il gruppo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Gouda-san richiamò i presenti, per poi farci strada. A chiudere il gruppo vi era Kumasawa-san.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san herkese seslendi ve bizi yönlendirmeye başladı.{n}Kumasawa-san arkadan geldi.

Steam (ST): A serpentine, twisting path led through a dim forest. It ran a bit uphill.
Umineko Project (UP): A serpentine, twisting path led through a dim forest.{n}It ran a bit uphill.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A serpentine, twisting path led into a dim forest. It ran a bit uphill.
PC Japanese (JP): 薄暗い森の中を、蛇腹になった捻くれた道が続く。わずかに登りになっていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 薄暗い森の中を、蛇腹になった捻くれた道が続く。{n}わずかに登りになっていた。
Russian (RU): Вьющаяся змеёю тропа вела в тусклый лес.{n}Она слегка поднималась в гору.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um serpentino e sinuoso caminho nos levou pela floresta.{n}Subindo uma grande colina.
Vietnamese (VI): Một con đường quanh co, uốn lượn dẫn xuyên qua khu rừng mờ tối.{n}Nó hơi dốc lên một chút.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 幽暗的森林中，延伸著蛇紋般蜿蜒曲折的小路。{n}小路僅有一點點坡度。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 幽暗的森林中，延伸着蛇纹般蜿蜒曲折的小路。{n}小路仅有一点点坡度。
Indonesian (IDN): Jalan berkelok-kelok melintasi hutan yang remang.{n}Agak menanjak.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un percorso contorto e serpentino portava verso una scura foresta. Era un po' in salita.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il percorso era contorto e serpentino, e si diramava all'interno di una selva oscura. Era leggermente in salita.
Turkish (TR): Yılan gibi kıvrılan bir patika loş bir ormanın içinden geçiyordu.{n}Biraz yokuş yukarı gidiyordu.

Steam (ST): I'd guess the path was made all twisty so the slope wouldn't seem too steep, but personally, I'd have been happier if they'd had the guts to make some stairs in a straight line.
Umineko Project (UP): I'd guess the path was made twisting so that the slope wouldn't be felt too much, but personally, I'd have been happier if they'd been man enough to make some stairs in a straight line.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'd guess the path was made twisting so that the slope wouldn't be felt too much, but personally, I'd have been happier if they'd had the guts to make some stairs in a straight line.
PC Japanese (JP): 傾斜を少しでも感じさせないために道を捻ってあるんだろうが、俺的には潔く直線の階段か何かにしてもらった方が嬉しい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 傾斜を少しでも感じさせないために道を捻ってあるんだろうが、俺的には潔く直線の階段か何かにしてもらった方が嬉しい。
Russian (RU): Думаю, тропу сделали извилистой, чтобы сгладить подъём вверх по склону, но лично я был бы довольнее, если бы у них хватило духу сделать прямую лестницу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Creio que o caminho tenha sido feito dessa forma para que não se sentisse tanto a subida, mas pessoalmente, eu ficaria muito mais feliz se eles tivessem tido mais coragem e feito uma escada em linha reta.
Vietnamese (VI): Tôi đoán họ làm đường vòng để người đi không cảm thấy dốc quá, nhưng cá nhân tôi thì thích kiểu đường thẳng tắp và có bậc cầu thang hơn.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然多半是為了盡量讓人不感到傾斜，才會把路搞得如此蜿蜒曲折，但我倒是更樂意走簡潔的直線台階之類的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然多半是为了尽量让人不感到倾斜，才会把路搞得如此蜿蜒曲折，但我倒是更乐意走简洁的直线台阶之类的。
Indonesian (IDN): Kurasa jalan dibuat berkelok agar tanjakan tidak terlalu terasa, tapi secara pribadi, aku lebih senang jika mereka cukup jantan untuk membuat tangga lurus.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Immagino che il percorso sia stato fatto in questo modo così che il pendio non si sentisse troppo, ma personalmente, sarei stato più felice se avessero avuto il gusto di fare un po' di scale dritte.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Immagino che avessero reso il percorso tortuoso per far notare di meno il pendio, ma secondo me sarebbe stato meglio se avessero fatto direttamente delle scale rettilinee, o qualcosa del genere...
Turkish (TR): Eğimin çok fazla hissedilmemesi için patikanın kıvrımlı yapıldığını tahmin ediyorum, ama şahsen, düz bir merdiven yapacak kadar erkek olsalardı daha mutlu olurdum.

Steam (ST): ......No doubt they made the path twist on purpose, to put on airs of distance and importance...
Umineko Project (UP): ......No doubt they made the path twisting on purpose, to put on airs of distance and importance...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......No doubt they made the path twisting on purpose, to put on airs of distance and importance...
PC Japanese (JP): ……絶対これ、勿体ぶって距離感を出すためにわざと道を捻ってあるぞ…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……絶対これ、勿体ぶって距離感を出すためにわざと道を捻ってあるぞ…。
Russian (RU): Но, несомненно, тропа была сделана извилистой намеренно, чтобы нагнать чувства отдалённости и важности....
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Sem dúvida, eles fizeram sinuoso por um motivo: dar um ar de ser algo distante e importante...
Vietnamese (VI): ......Chắc chắn họ cố tình làm cho đường đi quanh co, để cho có vẻ xa xôi và trang trọng...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這小路絕對是為了擺架子，想營造出距離感，才故意設計得這麼曲里拐彎的…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这小路绝对是为了摆架子，想营造出距离感，才故意设计得这么曲里拐弯的…。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Tidak diragukan lagi jalan dibuat berkelok sengaja, untuk memberi kesan jarak dan pentingnya...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non c'è dubbio che abbiano fatto la strada contorta di proposito, per dare un effetto di distanza e importanza...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Avevano attorcigliato il sentiero di proposito, per dare un effetto di lontananza e di autorevolezza...
Turkish (TR): ......Mesafe ve önem havası vermek için yolu bilerek kıvrımlı yaptıklarına şüphe yok...

Steam (ST): Before long, we saw garden-style stone steps.
Umineko Project (UP): Before long, we saw garden‐style stone steps.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Before long, we saw garden-style stone steps.
PC Japanese (JP): やがて石造りの庭園風の階段が見えてきた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): やがて石造りの庭園風の階段が見えてきた。
Russian (RU): Вскоре мы увидели каменные садовые ступени.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Depois de um longo percurso, nós vimos degraus feitos com pedras de jardim.
Vietnamese (VI): Chẳng mấy chốc, chúng tôi thấy những bậc thang đá mang phong cách của một khu vườn.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不久之後，一段石築庭園風的台階浮現於眼前。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不久之后，一段石筑庭园风的台阶浮现于眼前。
Indonesian (IDN): Tak lama kemudian, kami melihat tangga batu bergaya taman.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un po' prima, abbiamo visto una gradinata in pietra stile giardino.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Poco tempo dopo, vedemmo una scalinata in pietra posta in mezzo alla vegetazione...
Turkish (TR): Çok geçmeden bahçe tarzı taş basamaklar gördük.

Steam (ST): ...Aaah, from here on, I do have some memories. Go up these, and...
Umineko Project (UP): ...Ahhh, now, I remember how it goes from here.{n}Go up these, and...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Aaah, from here on, I have some memories. Go up these, and...
PC Japanese (JP): …あぁ、この辺からは記憶がある。こいつを上がると確か…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …あぁ、この辺からは記憶がある。{n}こいつを上がると確か…。
Russian (RU): Ах, вот отсюда у меня сохранились воспоминания.{n}Поднимемся по ним и...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Ahhh, eu me lembro desta parte.{n}Depois de subir aqui, e...
Vietnamese (VI): ...Ahhh, đúng rồi, tôi nhớ đoạn này rồi.{n}Đi lên mấy bậc này, và...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …啊，從這裡開始我有點印象了。{n}從這兒走上去好像是…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …啊，从这里开始我有点印象了。{n}从这儿走上去好像是…。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Ahhh, sekarang aku ingat jalannya dari sini.{n}Naiki ini, dan...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Aaah, da qui in poi, ho alcuni ricordi. Sali queste, e...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Aaah, me lo ricordavo questo posto. Se si saliva, mi pareva che...
Turkish (TR): ...Ahhh, buradan sonrasını hatırlıyorum.{n}Buradan yukarı çıkın ve...

Steam (ST): At the top of the stone steps, we saw a beautiful guesthouse.
Umineko Project (UP): At the top of the stone steps, a beautiful guesthouse came into view.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At the top of the stone steps, we saw a beautiful guesthouse.
PC Japanese (JP): 石段の向こうに、美しいゲストハウスが見えてくる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 石段の向こうに、美しいゲストハウスが見えてくる。
Russian (RU): На вершине каменной лестницы перед нашими глазами предстал прекрасный домик для гостей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No topo dos degraus de pedra, era possível ver uma bela casa de hóspedes.
Vietnamese (VI): Trên đỉnh bậc thang đá, một nhà khách tuyệt đẹp hiện ra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在石階之上，美麗的賓館映入眼簾。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在石阶之上，美丽的宾馆映入眼帘。
Indonesian (IDN): Di puncak tangga batu, sebuah guesthouse indah terlihat.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In cima alla gradinata in pietra, vedemmo una meravigliosa casa per gli ospiti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Arrivati in cima ai gradini in pietra, si poteva osservare una stupenda dépendance.
Turkish (TR): Taş basamakların tepesinde güzel bir konukevi göründü.

Steam (ST): Its facade was lovely, of course, but more importantly, ......we couldn't enter its doors without having our hearts stolen away by the splendor of the beautiful rose garden spreading before it.
Umineko Project (UP): Its façade was lovely, of course, but even more than that, ......we couldn't help but have our hearts stolen away by the splendor of that beautiful rose garden that spread before it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Its facade was of course lovely, but even more so, ......we couldn't enter its doors without having our hearts stolen away by the splendor of that beautiful rose garden that spread before it.
PC Japanese (JP): その佇まいももちろん素晴らしいものだが、それ以上に、……その前に広がる美しい薔薇の庭園の美しさに心を奪われずにはいられなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その佇まいももちろん素晴らしいものだが、それ以上に、……その前に広がる美しい薔薇の庭園の美しさに心を奪われずにはいられなかった。
Russian (RU): Его фасад был восхитителен, вот только... мы не могли не позволить роскошному розарию, раскинувшемуся перед ним, пленить наши сердца.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A fachada era adorável, é claro, mas era muito mais do que isso, ......era impossível não ter nossos corações roubados pelo esplendor do belo jardim de rosas que se propagava antes da entrada.
Vietnamese (VI): Mặt tiền thì dĩ nhiên là rất trang nhã, nhưng hơn cả điều đó thì ......chúng tôi không thể không bị mê hoặc bởi vẻ tráng lệ của vườn hồng trải rộng phía trước.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 賓館雖也甚是壯觀，但是比這更棒的，……是眼前的那片，美得讓人心都不禁被它奪走的玫瑰庭園。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 宾馆虽也甚是壮观，但是比这更棒的，……是眼前的那片，美得让人心都不禁被它夺走的玫瑰庭园。
Indonesian (IDN): Fasadnya cantik, tentu saja, tapi lebih dari itu, ......kami tak bisa tidak terpesona oleh kemegahan taman mawar indah yang terbentang di depannya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua facciata era ovviamente bellissima, ma, ancor di più... non avremmo potuto attraversare le sue porte senza che il nostro cuore venisse rapito dallo splendore di quell'incantevole roseto che si estendeva dinanzi a noi.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ovviamente la sua architettura era bellissima, ma soprattutto... era impossibile non restare ammaliati dallo splendore di quell'incantevole roseto, che si estendeva dinanzi a noi.
Turkish (TR): Dış cephesi elbette çok güzeldi ama bundan daha da fazlası vardı, ......önünde uzanan o güzel gül bahçesinin ihtişamı karşısında kalbimizin çalınmasına engel olamadık.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "Aaah! It's as beautiful as ever this year... A real delight for the eyes..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Haah~! It's as beautiful as ever this year... A real delight for the eyes..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Aaah~! It's as beautiful as ever this year... A real delight for the eyes..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「はぁ〜！　今年も相変わらず、大したもんや…。目の保養とはこのことやで…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「はぁ〜！　今年も相変わらず、大したもんや…。目の保養とはこのことやで…」
Russian (RU): "Ха‐а! Всё такой же красивый в этом году... Настоящая услада глазам..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Haah~! Está bonito como nunca este ano... Um verdadeiro deleite para os olhos..."
Vietnamese (VI): "Haah~! Năm nay vẫn đẹp như mọi khi nhỉ... Nhìn đã mắt thật đó..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哈啊～！今年也同往年一樣氣派吶…。“大飽眼福”說的就是這個吶…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哈啊～！今年也同往年一样气派呐…。“大饱眼福”说的就是这个呐…」
Indonesian (IDN): "Haah~! Indah seperti biasa tahun ini... Sungguh menyenangkan mata..."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Aaah~! Anche quest'anno, come sempre, è una meraviglia... è una vera delizia per gli occhi..."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Aaah! Come al solito, anche quest'anno è una meraviglia... Una vera gioia per gli occhi..."
Turkish (TR): "Haah~! Bu yıl da her zamanki gibi çok güzel... Gözler için gerçek bir zevk..."

Steam (ST): After climbing the stone steps, the people greeted by this rose garden gave voice to their impressions one by one.
Umineko Project (UP): As they reached the top of the stone steps, the people welcomed in by the rose garden voiced their appreciation one after another.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After climbing the stone steps, the people welcomed in by the rose garden gave voice to their impressions one by one.
PC Japanese (JP): 石段を登りきり、薔薇の庭園に迎えられた人たちは次々の感動を口にする。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 石段を登りきり、薔薇の庭園に迎えられた人たちは次々に感動を口にする。
Russian (RU): После подъёма по каменным ступенькам, люди, радушно встреченные розарием, один за другим высказывали своё впечатление, которое он произвёл на них.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ao chegarmos ao topo dos degraus de pedra, as pessoas, recebidas pelo jardim de rosas, deram suas impressões uma por uma.
Vietnamese (VI): Khi đã bước lên đoạn trên cùng của bậc thang đá, những người được chào đón bởi vườn hồng đều hết lòng khen ngợi vẻ đẹp diệu kỳ của khung cảnh này.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 登上石階，被玫瑰庭園所迎接的人們，紛紛將內心的感動化為了驚嘆。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 登上石阶，被玫瑰庭园所迎接的人们，纷纷将内心的感动化为了惊叹。
Indonesian (IDN): Saat mencapai puncak tangga batu, orang-orang yang disambut taman mawar mengungkapkan kekaguman mereka satu per satu.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver salito la scalinata, le persone che erano state accolte nel giardino di rose diedero voce alle loro impressioni, uno dopo l'altro.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Le persone che, dopo aver salito la scalinata di pietra, venivano accolte dalla visione del roseto, diedero voce alle loro impressioni, una dopo l'altra.
Turkish (TR): Taş basamakların tepesine ulaştıklarında, gül bahçesinin karşıladığı insanlar birbiri ardına takdirlerini dile getirdiler.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Is it just me, or are the flowers a little less lively this year? It's probably because it wasn't that hot this summer."
Umineko Project (UP): "Aren't the flowers less lively this year? It must be because the summer wasn't warm enough."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Aren't the flowers less lively this year? It must be because the summer wasn't warm enough."
PC Japanese (JP): 「今年は少し花に元気がないんじゃない？　やっぱり夏があまり暑くなかったせいかしら。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「今年は少し花に元気がないんじゃない？　やっぱり夏があまり暑くなかったせいかしら」
Russian (RU): "Не стали ли они менее живыми в этом году? Наверное, это из‐за того, что лето было недостаточно тёплым."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "As flores não estão menos vívidas esse ano? Deve ser porque o verão não foi quente o suficiente."
Vietnamese (VI): "Không phải hoa năm nay kém rực rỡ hơn sao? Có khi do mùa hè vừa rồi không đủ nóng nhỉ."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「今年花開得是不是有點沒精神呀？果然是由於夏天不怎麼熱的緣故麼。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「今年花开得是不是有点没精神呀？果然是由于夏天不怎么热的缘故么。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Bukankah bunganya kurang semangat tahun ini? Mungkin karena musim panas tidak cukup hangat."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non sono meno vivaci quest'anno? Forse perché l'estate non è stata abbastanza calda."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Sbaglio o i fiori quest'anno sono leggermente meno in salute? Dopotutto, può darsi che sia dovuto al poco calore di quest'estate."
Turkish (TR): "Çiçekler bu yıl daha az canlı gibi durmuyor mu? Yaz yeterince sıcak geçmediği için olmalı."

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "I also believe that was a factor. Sadly, this year's blooming is a tad inferior when compared to last year's."
Umineko Project (UP): "I also believe that is so. When one compares with last year's blooming, it is a pity that this year's is somewhat inferior."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I also believe that is so. When one compares with last year's blooming, it is a pity that this year's is a bit inferior."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そのせいもあるかと思います。去年の咲きに比べると、今年は少々見劣るのが残念です。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そのせいもあるかと思います。去年の咲きに比べると、今年は少々見劣るのが残念です」
Russian (RU): "Я разделяю ваши мысли. Жаль, что их цветение уступает тому, что нам довелось видеть в прошлом году."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu também acredito nisso. Quando comparamos com as florações dos últimos anos, é uma pena este ano estar tão inferior."
Vietnamese (VI): "Tôi cũng tin là vậy ạ. So với hoa nở năm ngoái, thì hoa năm nay lại có phần kém hơn. Thật đáng tiếc."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我想這也是原因之一。和去年盛開的樣子相比，今年確實略遜一籌，實屬可惜。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我想这也是原因之一。和去年盛开的样子相比，今年确实略逊一筹，实属可惜。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Aku juga berpikir begitu. Dibandingkan dengan mekarnya tahun lalu, sayang sekali tahun ini agak kurang."

Steam (ST): Even so, it was a delightful rose garden. I remembered that even six years ago, huge numbers of roses had greeted us every year.

Steam (ST): In the midst of all these magnificent roses, one single rose was just starting to wilt.
Umineko Project (UP): In the midst of all these magnificent roses, just one single rose was withering.

Umineko Project (UP): There wasn't any particular reason.{n}Some roses flourish, and others wither.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There wasn't any particular reason. Some roses flourish, and others wither.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 特別な理由があるわけじゃない。{n}元気な薔薇もあれば萎れる薔薇もある。

Vietnamese (VI): Cũng không có lý do đặc biệt gì cả.{n}Có hoa nở, thì cũng có hoa tàn.

Steam (ST): That's all there was to it, but Maria seemed very concerned about the only unhealthy one in the group.

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sebbene tutte le altre fossero in buono stato, una non lo era, e sembrava preoccupare seriamente Maria.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Sotto non vi era nulla di più, ma sebbene tutte le altre fossero in buono stato, una non stava bene, e Maria sembrava molto impensierita da ciò...
Turkish (TR): Hepsi bu kadardı, ama Maria sağlıklı bir grup gülün içinde sadece bir tane sağlıksız gül olmasından dolayı çok endişeli görünüyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...She must be feeling somehow like it's been left out.

Vietnamese (VI): ...Có lẽ con bé cảm thấy như bông hoa ấy đang bị bỏ rơi.

Indonesian (IDN): ...Dia pasti merasa seperti mawar itu ditinggalkan.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "Well, they all bloom and wither at their own paces. I'll bet this one's just starting to wilt early 'cause it got to bloom before any of the others."
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, they all bloom and wither on their own. I'll bet the only reason that one withered now is because it bloomed earlier than any of the other roses."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Well, you always get a few that wither. I'll bet the only reason that one withered is because it bloomed earlier than any of the other roses."
PC Japanese (JP): 「まぁ、咲いたり枯れたりはそれぞれだからなぁ。一足先に萎れる代わりに、その薔薇は他のどの薔薇よりも早く開花できたんだと思うぜ？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「まぁ、咲いたり枯れたりはそれぞれだからなぁ。一足先に萎れる代わりに、その薔薇は他のどの薔薇よりも早く開花できたんだと思うぜ？」
Russian (RU): "Ну, все они цветут и вянут сами по себе. Могу поспорить, что эта роза сейчас увядшая только потому, что она расцвела раньше всех остальных роз."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, elas florescem e murcham, cada uma no seu ritmo. Aposto que a única razão para ela já estar murcha é porque ela floresceu antes de todas as outras."
Vietnamese (VI): "Thật ra thì mỗi bông có thời điểm nở và tàn khác nhau. Chị đoán bông này chỉ là đã nở sớm hơn các bông khác thôi, cho nên nó mới tàn trước."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「畢竟花開花謝各有其命嘛。我覺得它雖然先枯萎了，但這也說明，它比別的玫瑰都更早地完成了開花嘞？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「毕竟花开花谢各有其命嘛。我觉得它虽然先枯萎了，但这也说明，它比别的玫瑰都更早地完成了开花嘞？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Yah, mereka semua mekar dan layu sendiri. Aku yakin satu-satunya alasan yang satu ini layu sekarang karena dia mekar lebih awal dari yang lain."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Beh, è perché tutte fioriscono e poi appassiscono. Invece di appassire in anticipo, immagino si possa dire che abbia fiorito più veloce delle altre rose."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Beh, è perché fioriscono e appassiscono a ritmi diversi. Immagino che invece di appassire più tardi, questa rosa sia fiorita più velocemente delle altre, no?"
Turkish (TR): "Hepsi kendi kendine açıyor ve soluyor. Bahse girerim bu gülün solmasının tek nedeni diğerlerinden daha erken açmış olmasıdır."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Battler
Steam (ST): "Yeah, that's right. It probably just bloomed like crazy, fulfilled its duty and went to sleep. You shouldn't get so worked up about it."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah, that's right. It probably just bloomed all over the place, fulfilled its duty and went to rest. You shouldn't get so worked up about it."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yeah, that's right. It probably just bloomed all over the place, fulfilled its duty and went to rest. You shouldn't get so worked up about it."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうだよな。いっぱい咲いて、その役目を終えてお休みに入ったってだけのことだと思うぜ。そんなに気に病むことはねぇさ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうだよな。いっぱい咲いて、その役目を終えてお休みに入ったってだけのことだと思うぜ。そんなに気に病むことはねぇさ」
Russian (RU): "Да, верно. Она, вероятно, просто цвела на всю катушку, выполнила свой долг и ушла на покой. Так что не стоит из‐за неё так переживать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, isso mesmo. Ela provavelmente já floresceu em todos os lugares, e agora que cumpriu o seu dever ela foi descansar. Você não deveria ficar tão preocupada com isso."
Vietnamese (VI): "Ừ, đúng đó. Có lẽ nó đã từng nở rộ rực rỡ, rồi hoàn thành vai trò của mình, và giờ thì đến lúc nó nghỉ ngơi rồi. Em không cần buồn vì điều đó đâu nhé."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是啊是啊。開的時候盡情綻放，完成自己的使命後就去休息了，我覺得僅此而已啊。用不著這麼為它擔心。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是啊是啊。开的时候尽情绽放，完成自己的使命后就去休息了，我觉得仅此而已啊。用不着这么为它担心。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Ya, benar. Dia mungkin sudah mekar di mana-mana, menyelesaikan tugasnya dan beristirahat. Kau tidak perlu terlalu khawatir tentang itu."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì, hai ragione. Immagino che sia fiorita al massimo, abbia svolto il suo dovere e sia andata a riposarsi. Non dovresti agitarti tanto."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Proprio così. Immagino che sia fiorita al massimo, abbia svolto il suo dovere e sia andata a riposarsi. Non stare così tanto in pensiero."
Turkish (TR): "Evet, bu doğru. Muhtemelen mükemmel bir şekilde çiçek açmış, görevini yerine getirmiş ve dinlenmeye çekilmiştir. Bu konuda bu kadar telaşlanmamalısın."

Steam (ST): It seemed that Maria's pure, sensitive nature was making her feel some emotional pain for the rose that wilted alone.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that Maria's pure, sensitive nature was making her feel some emotional pain for the rose that withered alone.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed that Maria's pure, sensitive nature was making her feel some emotional pain for the rose that withered alone.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞の無垢な感受性は、このぽつりと萎れる薔薇に何かの感傷を感じさせるらしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 真里亞の無垢な感受性は、このぽつりと萎れる薔薇に何かの感傷を感じさせるらしい。
Russian (RU): Видимо, чистая и чувствительная натура Марии заставляла её чувствовать некую эмоциональную боль за розу, которая завяла в одиночестве.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parece que a pura e sensível natureza da Maria faz com que ela sinta uma dor emocional por ver aquela única rosa murchando.
Vietnamese (VI): Có vẻ như bản tính trong sáng và nhạy cảm của Maria khiến con bé cảm thấy buồn bã vì bông hồng đơn độc đang tàn úa kia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞那份純潔無垢的感受性，似乎讓她從這朵孤零零枯萎的玫瑰上面感到了某種感傷。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚那份纯洁无垢的感受性，似乎让她从这朵孤零零枯萎的玫瑰上面感到了某种感伤。
Indonesian (IDN): Tampaknya sifat Maria yang murni dan sensitif membuatnya merasakan sakit emosional untuk mawar yang layu sendirian.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che la pura sensibilità di Maria le stesse provocando qualche dolore emotivo per la rosa che stava appassendo da sola.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Sembrava che la sensibilità innocente di Maria fosse in qualche modo urtata dalla rosa che stava appassendo in solitudine.
Turkish (TR): Görünüşe göre Maria'nın saf ve hassas doğası, tek başına solan gül için duygusal bir acı hissetmesine neden oluyordu.

Steam (ST): Even though she understood the logic of it, it still felt lonely to her.

Indonesian (IDN): "Baru setelah aku meninggalkan rumah ini menjadi semegah ini. Meski aku lebih menyukai taman sederhana sebelumnya. Nii-san terlalu banyak mengutak-atiknya, dengan selera yang agak dipertanyakan. Jauh lebih baik seperti sebelumnya."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Quando lasciai la Villa, cominciò a diventare davvero qualcosa. Ma prima, il giardino era più semplice, ma sono comunque ancora affezionata a quello. Nii-san ci giocherellava troppo, con il suo leggermente pessimo gusto. Era meglio come era prima."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È diventato così imponente dopo che me ne sono andata. Ma ero affezionata alla semplicità del vecchio giardino. Mio fratello maggiore lo ha modificato in maniera troppo pacchiana. Era molto meglio com'era prima."
Turkish (TR): "Ben evden ayrıldıktan hemen sonra bu kadar büyük oldu. Gerçi önceki rüstik bahçeyi daha çok severdim. Nii-san biraz şüpheli zevkiyle bahçeyle çok fazla oynadı. Önceki hali çok daha iyiydi."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "Eva, you've gotta think positive! Settin' aside how it used to look, its beauty now is somethin' to be admired. You'll be able to relax a lot better if you look at it that way."
Umineko Project (UP): "Eva, you've gotta think positive! No matter how it might've looked, its beauty now is something to be admired. You'll be able to relax a lot better if you look at it that way."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Eva, you've gotta think positive! Regardless of how it once looked, its beauty now is something to be admired. You'll be able to relax a lot better if you look at it that way."
PC Japanese (JP): 「絵羽、ポジティブシンキングやで！　昔は置いといて、今のこの美しさを愛でなあかん。その方が心が安らかになるでぇ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「絵羽、ポジティブシンキングやで！　昔は置いといて、今のこの美しさを愛でなあかん。その方が心が安らかになるでぇ」
Russian (RU): "Ева, надо мыслить оптимистичней! Независимо от того, как он выглядел раньше, его нынешней красотой нельзя не восхититься. Тебе удастся расслабиться намного больше, если ты будешь думать так."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eva, você precisa pensar positivamente! Não importa como se olha, ele está tão lindo que deve ser admirado. Você é capaz de relaxar bastante se olhar para ele assim."
Vietnamese (VI): "Eva, em phải suy nghĩ tích cực lên chứ! Dù trông như thế nào, thì vẻ đẹp hiện tại vẫn rất đáng để ngắm nhìn mà. Nghĩ như vậy sẽ giúp em thư thái hơn nhiều đó."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「繪羽，人吶看事物得樂觀向上一點！把過去的放在一邊，去感受現在的美好。這樣心靈才能安寧吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「绘羽，人呐看事物得乐观向上一点！把过去的放在一边，去感受现在的美好。这样心灵才能安宁呐。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Eva, kau harus berpikir positif! Tidak peduli bagaimana tampilannya dulu, keindahannya sekarang patut dikagumi. Kau akan bisa lebih santai jika melihatnya seperti itu."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Eva, devi pensare positivo! Lascia perdere il passato, devi ammirare la bellezza del giardino di adesso. In questo modo, il tuo cuore troverà pace."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Pensa positivo, Eva! Lascia il passato alle spalle, e ammira la bellezza di quello che c'è adesso. È così che troverai la pace."
Turkish (TR): "Eva, olumlu düşünmelisin! Eskiden nasıl görünürse görünsün, şimdiki güzelliği hayran olunacak bir şey. Bu şekilde bakarsan çok daha fazla keyfini çıkarabilirsin."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "I didn't mean it like that... I was just saying that I wanted you to see this garden the way it was before too."
Umineko Project (UP): "I didn't mean it like that... I was just saying that I would have liked you to have seen the old, more wonderful garden as well."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I didn't mean it like that... I was just saying that I wanted you to see this garden the way it was before too."
PC Japanese (JP): 「別にそんな意味じゃぁ。ただ私は、昔の方が素敵だった庭園をあなたにも見て欲しかったなぁってだけよぅ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「別にそんな意味じゃぁ。ただ私は、昔の方が素敵だった庭園をあなたにも見て欲しかったなぁってだけよぅ」
Russian (RU): "Я не совсем это имела в виду... Я всего лишь сказала, что также хотела бы увидеть розарий таким, каким он был прежде."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não foi o que eu quis dizer... Eu só estava dizendo que eu gostaria que você pudesse ter visto o maravilhoso jardim antigo."
Vietnamese (VI): "Em không có ý đó... Em chỉ muốn nói là, em cũng muốn mọi người được thấy cái khu vườn cổ kính, tuyệt vời ngày xưa thôi."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我也沒那個意思嘛。我只不過是想讓你也看看，從前那個樸素雅致的庭園而已啦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我也没那个意思嘛。我只不过是想让你也看看，从前那个朴素雅致的庭园而已啦。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Aku tidak bermaksud seperti itu... Aku hanya ingin kalian juga melihat taman lama yang lebih indah."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non intendevo dire quello... stavo solo dicendo che avrei voluto farvi vedere come era prima questo giardino."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Non intendevo dire quello... È solo che avrei voluto farti vedere quanto il giardino fosse bello una volta."
Turkish (TR): "Öyle demek istemedim... Sadece eski, daha harika bahçeyi de görmenizi isterdim diyordum."

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "Everyone, if you please, I shall guide you to your rooms now."
Umineko Project (UP): "Now then, everyone, if you please. I shall be guiding you to the rooms now."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Now then, everyone, if you please. I shall be guiding you to the rooms now."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それでは皆様、よろしいでしょうか。そろそろお部屋の方にご案内いたします。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それでは皆様、よろしいでしょうか。そろそろお部屋の方にご案内いたします」
Russian (RU): "Итак, дамы и господа, если никто не возражает, я сопровожу вас в ваши комнаты."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pois bem, pessoal, se me permitem. Eu vou levá‐los até os seu quartos agora."
Vietnamese (VI): "Vậy thì, xin mời mọi người. Tôi sẽ hướng dẫn các vị đến phòng nghỉ ngay bây giờ."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那麼各位，欣賞得如何？差不多是時候帶各位去房間了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那么各位，欣赏得如何？差不多是时候带各位去房间了。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Kalau begitu, semuanya, silakan. Aku akan memandu kalian ke kamar sekarang."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ora, voi tutti, se non vi spiace... vi guiderò alle vostre stanze."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Bene signori, se non vi dispiace. Lasciate che vi guidi verso le vostre stanze."
Turkish (TR): "Şimdi herkes, lütfen. Şimdi size odalarınıza kadar rehberlik edeceğim."

Steam (ST): Gohda-san called to everyone to ask if we were ready, but our hearts had been completely stolen away by the rose garden that none of us had seen for a year, so we didn't pay much attention to him.
Umineko Project (UP): Gohda‐san called to everyone to ask if we were ready, but our hearts had been completely stolen away by the rose garden after a year of absence, and we didn't lend him an ear.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san called to everyone to ask if we were ready, but our hearts had been completely stolen away by the rose garden after a year of absence, and we didn't lend him an ear.
PC Japanese (JP): 郷田さんがそろそろ良いかとみんなに声を掛けるが、一年ぶりの薔薇庭園にすっかり心を奪われてしまって、なかなか耳を貸そうとはしなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 郷田さんがそろそろ良いかとみんなに声を掛けるが、一年ぶりの薔薇庭園にすっかり心を奪われてしまって、なかなか耳を貸そうとはしなかった。
Russian (RU): Года‐сан обратился ко всем, чтобы узнать, готовы ли мы, но после годового отсутствия наши сердца находились во власти розария, и мы не услышали его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Gohda‐san chamou a todos, perguntando se já estávamos prontos, mas nossos corações haviam sido completamente roubados pelo jardim de rosas, após passarmos um ano sem vê‐lo, e nem demos ouvidos.
Vietnamese (VI): Chú Gohda gọi mọi người để hỏi xem chúng tôi đã sẵn sàng chưa, nhưng trái tim chúng tôi đã hoàn toàn bị mê hoặc bởi khu vườn hồng sau một năm xa cách, và chẳng ai để ý đến lời gọi ấy.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田問大家是不是差不多該走了，不過，像是被闊別了一年的玫瑰庭園奪走了心靈一樣，大家都沒怎麼留意他的話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 乡田问大家是不是差不多该走了，不过，像是被阔别了一年的玫瑰庭园夺走了心灵一样，大家都没怎么留意他的话。
Indonesian (IDN): Gohda-san memanggil semua orang untuk menanyakan apakah kami siap, tapi hati kami sudah sepenuhnya direbut oleh taman mawar setelah setahun tidak bertemu, dan kami tidak mendengarkannya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gohda-san chiamò tutti per vedere se erano pronti, ma i nostri cuori erano stati completamente rapiti dal giardino di rose, dopo un anno di assenza, e non lo avevamo minimamente ascoltato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Gouda-san richiamò tutti per capire se fossero pronti, ma erano completamente rapiti dal roseto che non vedevano da un anno, e non lo ascoltarono minimamente.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san hazır olup olmadığımızı sormak için herkese seslendi, ama kalbimiz bir yıllık ara nedeniyle gül bahçesi tarafından tamamen çalınmıştı ve ona kulak vermedik.

Umineko Project (UP): Since we weren't a travel group, it wasn't like we had a strict schedule to follow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since we weren't a travel group, it wasn't like we had a strict schedule to follow.
PC Japanese (JP): 団体旅行じゃないから、厳しいスケジュールがあるわけじゃない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 団体旅行じゃないから、厳しいスケジュールがあるわけじゃない。
Russian (RU): Поскольку мы не были тургруппой, мы не обязаны были следовать строгому графику.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como não estamos viajando em grupo, não é como se precisássemos seguir um cronograma rigoroso.
Vietnamese (VI): Vì đây không phải là một tour du lịch, nên chúng tôi đâu cần tuân theo lịch trình nghiêm ngặt nào.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟這不是團體旅行，當然也就沒有嚴格的日程表了。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Non essendo una comitiva turistica, non avevamo degli orari precisi da dover rispettare.

Steam (ST): Besides, since our parents were visiting their old home, full of nostalgia, it wasn't like they had to let themselves be urged on by anyone or anything.
Umineko Project (UP): Besides, for our parents, this was their fond old birth home they had returned to, so they felt no obligation to be pressured by anyone.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Besides, since our parents were visiting their old home, full of nostalgia, it wasn't like they had to let themselves be urged on by anyone or anything.
PC Japanese (JP): それに、親兄弟たちにとっては懐かしき実家の敷地内なので、誰かに促される義理もないのだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それに、親兄弟たちにとっては懐かしき実家の敷地内なので、誰かに促される義理もないのだろう。
Russian (RU): К тому же, поскольку наши родители вернулись в свой любимый родной дом, они не были обязаны позволять кому‐то или чему‐то подгонять себя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além do mais, para os nossos pais, esse é o encontro deles com a casa onde nasceram, por isso, ele não se sentem obrigados a se apressarem por causa de ninguém.
Vietnamese (VI): Vả lại, với cha mẹ chúng tôi, đây chính là ngôi nhà trong ký ức tuổi thơ mà họ được trở về, cho nên không một ai thấy cần phải vội vã theo lời ai cả.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而且對於我老爸這几兄妹來說，這是在充滿回憶的老家院子裡，自然也沒有被別人催促的道理吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且对于我老爸这几兄妹来说，这是在充满回忆的老家院子里，自然也没有被别人催促的道理吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Selain itu, bagi orang tua kami, ini adalah rumah lama mereka yang penuh kenangan, jadi mereka tidak merasa tertekan oleh siapa pun.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Oltretutto, visto che i nostri parenti stavano visitando la loro vecchia casa, pieni di nostalgia, non è che dovevano essere spronati da qualcuno o qualcosa.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E poi, i nostri parenti non avevano motivo di venire spronati da qualcuno, dato che erano nei pressi della loro cara, vecchia casa.
Turkish (TR): Ayrıca, ebeveynlerimiz için burası geri döndükleri eski doğdukları evdi, bu yüzden kimsenin baskısına maruz kalma zorunluluğu hissetmiyorlardı.

Steam (ST): Understanding the situation, Gohda-san continued to wait, smiling widely, until our parents got tired of the roses and told him to guide us to our rooms...
Umineko Project (UP): Understanding the situation, Gohda‐san continued to wait, with a wide smile, for our parents to lose interest in the roses and tell him to guide us to the rooms...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Understanding the situation, Gohda-san continued to wait, smiling widely, until our parents got tired of the roses and told him to guide us to the rooms...
PC Japanese (JP): その辺りの事情を理解し、郷田さんは親たちが薔薇に飽きて部屋に案内してくれと言い出すまで、にこやかなまま待ち続けるのだった…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その辺りの事情を理解し、郷田さんは親たちが薔薇に飽きて部屋に案内してくれと言い出すまで、にこやかなまま待ち続けるのだった…。
Russian (RU): Понимая ситуацию, Года‐сан, широко улыбаясь, продолжал ждать, пока наши родители не устанут от лицезрения роз и не попросят его проводить их в отведенные им комнаты...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Compreendendo a situação, o Gohda‐san continuou a esperar, com um grande sorriso, até que nossos pais perdessem o interesse nas rosas e dissessem para nos levar até nossos quartos...
Vietnamese (VI): Hiểu được điều đó, chú Gohda tiếp tục đứng chờ với một nụ cười rộng mở, cho đến khi cha mẹ chúng tôi chán ngắm hoa và bảo chú dẫn về phòng nghỉ...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 明白了這點的鄉田，直到老爸他們看膩玫瑰後自己說出帶我們去房間之前，一直保持著笑容站在一邊耐心地等待…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 明白了这点的乡田，直到老爸他们看腻玫瑰后自己说出带我们去房间之前，一直保持着笑容站在一边耐心地等待…。
Indonesian (IDN): Memahami situasinya, Gohda-san terus menunggu, dengan senyum lebar, sampai orang tua kami kehilangan minat pada mawar dan memintanya memandu kami ke kamar...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Comprendendo la situazione, Gohda-san continuò ad attendere, sorridendo sempre, fino a che i nostri parenti si stancarono delle rose e gli chiesero di dirigerli alle camere...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Comprendendo tali circostanze, Gouda-san rimase sorridente, e attese fino al momento in cui i nostri genitori non si stancarono delle rose e gli chiesero di portarli verso le loro camere...
Turkish (TR): Durumu anlayan Gohda-san, geniş bir gülümsemeyle, ebeveynlerimizin güllere olan ilgisini kaybetmesini ve bizi odalara götürmesini söylemesini beklemeye devam etti...

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 大概是因為剛剛看過鄉田那樣的大塊頭，少年的身材顯得更加矮小了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 大概是因为刚刚看过乡田那样的大块头，少年的身材显得更加矮小了。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La sua figura appariva ancor più minuta, dopo aver visto un uomo dalla grossa corporatura come Gouda.

Steam (ST): The boy was in the middle of transporting piled-up gardening tools and the like in a wheelbarrow.
Umineko Project (UP): The boy was in the middle of transporting piled‐up gardening tools and the like in a wheelbarrow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The boy was in the middle of transporting piled-up gardening tools and the like in a wheelbarrow.
PC Japanese (JP): 少年は、手押しの猫車に園芸の道具などを積んで運んでいるところだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 少年は、手押しの猫車に園芸の道具などを積んで運んでいるところだった。
Russian (RU): Он был занят транспортировкой различных садовых принадлежностей в тачке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O garoto estava transportando diversas ferramentas de jardinagem, empilhadas em um carrinho de mão.
Vietnamese (VI): Cậu ấy đang đẩy một chiếc xe rùa chất đầy dụng cụ làm vườn các loại.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il ragazzo stava spingendo una carriola, in cui vi erano ammassati, tra le varie cose, degli attrezzi da giardinaggio.
Turkish (TR): Çocuk bir el arabasında yığılı bahçe aletlerini ve benzerlerini taşımanın ortasındaydı.

Steam (ST): When he realized he was being called to stop, he set down the wheelbarrow, took his hat off and bowed his head.
Umineko Project (UP): When he realized he was being called to stop, he set down the wheelbarrow, took his hat off and bowed his head.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When he realized he was being called to stop, he set down the wheelbarrow, took his hat off and bowed his head.

Speaker: Kanon
Steam (ST): "............ ...Good afternoon."

Steam (ST): ...I figured he was probably younger than me. And I realized by the general atmosphere surrounding him that he was another servant.
Umineko Project (UP): ...I figured he was probably younger than me.{n}I realized by the general atmosphere surrounding him that he was a servant too.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...I figured he was probably younger than me. I realized by the general atmosphere surrounding him that he was a servant too.
PC Japanese (JP): …多分、俺より年下だと思う。雰囲気から彼も使用人であることがわかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …多分、俺より年下だと思う。{n}雰囲気から彼も使用人であることがわかった。
Russian (RU): По моим прикидкам он был младше меня.{n}Ещё, по общей атмосфере, окружавшей его, я понял, что он слуга.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Ele provavelmente deveria ser mais novo que eu.{n}Eu percebi pela atmosfera que o cercava, que ele também devia ser um serviçal.
Vietnamese (VI): ...Tôi đoán cậu ấy có lẽ trẻ hơn tôi.{n}Tôi nhận ra qua bầu không khí xung quanh cậu ấy, rằng cậu cũng là một gia nhân.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …我想他的年紀應該比我小吧。{n}從氛圍來看，他也是傭人中的一員。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …我想他的年纪应该比我小吧。{n}从氛围来看，他也是佣人中的一员。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Kutebak usianya mungkin lebih muda dariku.{n}Aku menyadari dari aura umum di sekitarnya bahwa dia juga seorang pelayan.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): ...Forse era più giovane di me. Dal modo in cui si atteggiava, capii che anche lui era un domestico.
Turkish (TR): ...Muhtemelen benden daha genç olduğunu düşündüm.{n}Etrafındaki genel havadan onun da bir hizmetkâr olduğunu anladım.

Steam (ST): He greeted us in response to Uncle Hideyoshi's call, but he seemed like he might be pretty unsociable most of the time.
Umineko Project (UP): Though he did greet Uncle Hideyoshi back, he himself seemed like he might be unsociable.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He answered Hideyoshi oji-san's greeting, but he seemed unsociable deep down.
PC Japanese (JP): 秀吉伯父さんの挨拶に応える形で挨拶を返してくれたが、本来は無愛想なのかもしれない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 秀吉伯父さんの挨拶に応える形で挨拶を返してくれたが、本来は無愛想なのかもしれない。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Embora ele tivesse cumprimentado o tio Hideyoshi, ele parecia ser um pouco antissocial.
Vietnamese (VI): Mặc dù cậu ấy có chào lại chú Hideyoshi, nhưng bản thân cậu ấy có vẻ hơi khó gần.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然他对秀吉姑父的招呼回了礼，但是本人说不定是个待人冷淡的人。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Aveva ricambiato al saluto portogli da zio Hideyoshi, ma sembrava essere un tipo distaccato.

Steam (ST): It was a greeting that lacked feeling.
Umineko Project (UP): It was a greeting that lacked feeling.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was a greeting that lacked feeling.
PC Japanese (JP): ちょっと感情の篭らない挨拶だった。

Russian (RU): В его приветствии не хватало чувства.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 回禮中少了那麼點感情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 回礼中少了那么点感情。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Era un saluto leggermente privo di sentimento.

Steam (ST): When Gohda-san noticed that our interest had shifted towards him, he went to the boy's side and introduced him to us.
Umineko Project (UP): When Gohda‐san noticed that our interest had shifted towards him, he went to the boy's side and introduced him to us.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Gohda-san noticed that our interest had shifted towards him, he went to the boy's side and introduced him to us.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺らの関心が彼に移ったのに気付くと、郷田さんは少年の脇に行き紹介してくれた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺らの関心が彼に移ったのに気付くと、郷田さんは少年の脇に行き紹介してくれた。
