Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando o Gohda‐san percebeu que o nosso interesse havia se voltado pare ele, logo ele foi até o garoto para apresentá‐lo para nós.

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "Battler-sama, allow me to introduce you. This is one of the servants of the Ushiromiya Head Household. ...Kanon-san, greet our guest."
Umineko Project (UP): "Battler‐sama, I shall introduce you. He is one of the servants who serve the Ushiromiya head house. ...Kanon‐san, greet our guest."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Battler-sama, I shall introduce you. He is one of the servants who serve the Ushiromiya head house. ...Kanon-san, greet our guest."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「戦人さま、ご紹介いたします。右代宮本家にお仕えしております使用人のひとりです。…嘉音さん、お客様にご挨拶を」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「战人少爷，请恕鄙人介绍一下。他是侍奉右代宫本家的佣人之一。…嘉音，跟客人们打个招呼。」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Signorino Battler, lasci che ve lo presenti. Lui è uno dei domestici al servizio della famiglia Ushiromiya... Porgi i tuoi saluti al nostro ospite, Kanon-san."

Steam (ST): Yep, my first impression wasn't wrong. He seemed to be unsociable, or at least not so good at talking.
Umineko Project (UP): Yep, my first impression wasn't wrong—he gave the feeling that he was unsociable, or maybe a bit of a poor speaker.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Yep, my first impression wasn't wrong, he gave the feeling that he was unsociable, and a bit of a poor speaker.
PC Japanese (JP): やはり第一印象に違わず、無愛想というか、口下手だなと感じた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): やはり第一印象に違わず、無愛想というか、口下手だなと感じた。
Russian (RU): Да, моё первое впечатление не обмануло меня, по ощущениям, он был необщителен и не силён в ораторстве.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 果然第一印象沒有錯。與其說是待人冷淡，倒不如說是給人一種不善言辭的感覺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 果然第一印象没有错。与其说是待人冷淡，倒不如说是给人一种不善言辞的感觉。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In fin dei conti la mia prima impressione non era sbagliata: sembrava essere poco socievole, o impacciato nel parlare.
Turkish (TR): Evet, ilk izlenimimde yanılmamışım—çekingen ya da biraz kötü konuşan biri olduğu hissini verdi.

Steam (ST): Compared to Gohda-san, who was extraordinarily polished as a servant, you couldn't help but feel an inexperience typical of his age.
Umineko Project (UP): In contrast with Gohda‐san, who was extraordinarily polished as a servant, it was impossible not to feel the immaturity you'd expect of someone his age.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Compared to Gohda-san, who was extraordinarily polished as a servant, no matter what he did, he gave off a feeling of inexperience typical of his age.
PC Japanese (JP): 郷田さんが使用人として非常に洗練されていることと比べると、どうしても年齢相応の未熟さを感じてしまうのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 郷田さんが使用人として非常に洗練されていることと比べると、どうしても年齢相応の未熟さを感じてしまうのだった。
Russian (RU): По сравнению с Годой‐саном, великолепно вышколенным слугой, что бы он ни делал, от него веяло неопытностью, типичной для юного возраста.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O que contrasta com o Gohda‐san, que é um serviçal extremamente educado. Era impossível não sentir a imaturidade que você espera vinda de alguém da sua idade.
Vietnamese (VI): Trái ngược với chú Gohda, người có phong thái vô cùng chuẩn mực của một gia nhân, thật khó để không cảm nhận được sự non nớt thường thấy ở một người ở độ tuổi như cậu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 比起鄉田作為傭人那老練的技巧，怎麼看他都只會感覺到與他年齡相稱的青澀。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 比起乡田作为佣人那老练的技巧，怎么看他都只会感觉到与他年龄相称的青涩。
Indonesian (IDN): Berbeda dengan Gohda-san yang sangat terampil sebagai pelayan, mustahil untuk tidak merasakan kekurangdewasaan yang wajar untuk usianya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Al contrario di Gohda-san, che era straordinariamente educato come domestico, non importa quello che facesse, aveva un atteggiamento di inesperienza tipico della sua età.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Confrontandolo con Gouda-san, che come domestico era straordinariamente posato, volente o nolente risultava essere immaturo, come ogni ragazzo della sua età.
Turkish (TR): Bir hizmetkâr olarak olağanüstü kibar olan Gohda-san'ın aksine, onun yaşındaki birinden bekleyeceğiniz olgunlaşmamışlığı hissetmemek mümkün değildi.

Steam (ST): When Gohda-san urged him in a whisper to give a bit more of an introduction, the boy named Kanon only cast his eyes downwards.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): When Gohda-san urged him in a whisper to give a bit more of an introduction, the boy named Kanon only cast his eyes downwards.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田小聲催促著他“就不能做下自我介紹嗎”，被稱作嘉音的少年卻依然只是低頭不語。

Umineko Project (UP): "Heh heh~, I'm glad you're about our age! Just be cool and call me Battler! And I'll call you Kanon!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Heh he~, I'm glad you're about our age! Just be cool and call me Battler! And I'll call you Kanon!"

Steam (ST): Jessica looked panicky for some reason. She seemed to think my impression of Kanon was getting worse because of his refusal.
Umineko Project (UP): Jessica looked flustered for some reason.{n}She seemed to think that my impression of Kanon was worsening because of his rejection.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Jessica looked all downcast for some reason. She seemed to think that my impression of Kanon was worsening because of his rejection.
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香が勝手にあわあわしてる。嘉音くんの拒絶的な返事に俺が印象を悪くしているものと思っているらしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 朱志香が勝手にあわあわしてる。{n}嘉音くんの拒絶的な返事に俺が印象を悪くしているものと思っているらしい。

Steam (ST): Well, as a girl, Jessica probably couldn't understand the fretful male heart at this age.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Well, that girl Jessica probably couldn't understand the fretful male heart at this age.

Steam (ST): As his elder, even by just two years, I took it upon myself to be understanding of that.
Umineko Project (UP): As his elder—even by just two years—who would lead him into adolescence, I took it upon myself to understand that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As his elder, even by just two years, who would lead him into adolescence, I took it upon myself to understand that.

Russian (RU): Как старший, пусть и на два года, человек, который проведёт его через этот трудный возраст, я взял на себя ответственность подумать об этом.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Well, it's a prickly age. Let's just leave him be. After all, closed-mouthed servants are the best kind. Isn't that right, Kumasawa-san?"

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It's a prickly age. You be nice to him. Close-mouthed servants are just fine. Right, Kumasawa-san?"

Indonesian (IDN): "Usia yang sulit. Bersikap baiklah padanya. Diam itu yang diinginkan dari pelayan. Benar kan, Kumasawa-san?"

Steam (ST): Everyone smiled wryly at that obvious lie. Even she herself didn't believe that, not in her wildest dreams. So, she must've said it to lighten the mood.
Umineko Project (UP): Everyone smiled wryly at that shameless lie.{n}Even she herself didn't believe that, not in her wildest dreams.{n}She said that to loosen us all up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Everyone smiled wryly at that shameless lie. Even she herself didn't believe that, not in her wildest dreams. She said that to loosen us all up.
PC Japanese (JP): その白々しい言葉にみんなは思わず苦笑いを漏らす。本人だって夢にもそう思ってなんかいない。だから、場を和ますために言ってくれたのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その白々しい言葉にみんなは思わず苦笑いを漏らす。{n}本人だって夢にもそう思ってなんかいない。{n}だから、場を和ますために言ってくれたのだ。
Russian (RU): Все натянуто улыбнулись столь наглой лжи.{n}Даже она сама, в своих самых смелых мечтах, ни за что бы в это не поверила.{n}Она сказала это, чтобы снять наше напряжение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todos sorriram ironicamente para essa mentira descarada.{n}Nem mesmo ela acredita nisso, nem em seus próprios sonhos.{n}Ela deixa escapar tudo.
Vietnamese (VI): Ai nấy đều cười gượng với lời dối trắng trợn đó.{n}Ngay cả chính bà ấy cũng không tin được lời mình nói, dù chỉ là trong mơ.{n}Bà nói vậy chỉ để giúp mọi người thư giãn thôi.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 聽了她這句裝模作樣的話，大家都不禁露出了苦笑。{n}就算她本人做夢的時候也不會這麼想。{n}所以，她其實是為了緩和氣氛而特意這樣說的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 听了她这句装模作样的话，大家都不禁露出了苦笑。{n}就算她本人做梦的时候也不会这么想。{n}所以，她其实是为了缓和气氛而特意这样说的。
Indonesian (IDN): Semua orang tersenyum kecut pada kebohongan tak tahu malunya itu.{n}Bahkan dia sendiri tidak percaya itu, bahkan dalam mimpi paling liar sekalipun.{n}Dia mengatakannya untuk mencairkan suasana.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tutti risero ironicamente a quella spudorata bugia. Persino lei stessa non ci credeva, nemmeno nei suoi sogni più profondi. Lo disse per farci rilassare.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Davanti a quella palese bugia, tutti si fecero sfuggire istintivamente una risata.Nemmeno lei credeva alle sue stesse parole. Lo aveva detto per sdrammatizzare.
Turkish (TR): Bu utanmaz yalan karşısında herkes alaycı bir şekilde gülümsedi.{n}Kendisi bile buna inanmıyordu, en çılgın rüyalarında bile.{n}Bunu hepimizi gevşetmek için söyledi.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "I'd like to set down our luggage soon. Gohda-san, what rooms are we all going to take?"
Umineko Project (UP): "I'd like to put down the luggage soon. Gohda‐san, how are we to split up for our rooms?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I'd like to put down the luggage soon. Gohda-san, how are we to split up for our rooms?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「そろそろ荷物を置きたいわね。郷田さん、部屋割りはどうなってるのかしら？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そろそろ荷物を置きたいわね。郷田さん、部屋割りはどうなってるのかしら？」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu gostaria de desfazer as malas logo. Gohda‐san, como vamos dividir nossos quartos?"
Vietnamese (VI): "Tôi muốn cất hành lý sớm một chút. Anh Gohda, chúng tôi sẽ chia phòng thế nào?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「差不多该去把行李放好了。乡田，房间是怎么分配的？」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Vorrei posare le valigie il prima possibile. Qual'è la disposizone delle stanze, Gouda-san?"
Turkish (TR): "Bavulları bir an önce bırakmak istiyorum. Gohda-san, odalarımız için nasıl ayrılacağız?"

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "It shall be the same as the previous year. Allow me to guide you. Please, this way."
Umineko Project (UP): "It shall be the same as last year. I shall guide you. Please, this way."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "It shall be the same as the previous year. I shall guide you. Please, this way."
PC Japanese (JP): 「昨年と同じになっております。さ、ご案内いたします。どうぞこちらへ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「昨年と同じになっております。さ、ご案内いたします。どうぞこちらへ」
Russian (RU): "Так же, как и в прошлом году. Я отведу вас. Пожалуйста, сюда."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Deve ser da mesma forma que no ano passado. Eu vou levá‐los até eles.{n}Por favor, venham por aqui."
Vietnamese (VI): "Sẽ giống như năm ngoái, thưa bà. Tôi xin phép được dẫn đường. Xin mời đi lối này."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「和去年是一样的。鄙人这就带大家一起过去。请往这边走。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Sama seperti tahun lalu. Saya akan memandu Anda. Silakan, lewat sini."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Dovreste essere divisi come l'anno scorso. Vi farò strada. Prego, da questa parte."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "La disposizione è la stessa dell'anno scorso. Vi guiderò io. Prego, da questa parte."
Turkish (TR): "Geçen yılki gibi olacak. Size rehberlik edeceğim. Lütfen, bu taraftan."

Steam (ST): We headed towards a trim, elegantly simple guesthouse. This was gonna be our temporary quarters for the night.
Umineko Project (UP): We headed towards the trim and elegant guesthouse.{n}This was going to be our temporary quarters for a night.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We headed towards a trim, elegantly simple guesthouse. This was gonna be our temporary quarters for a night.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺たちは瀟洒で小綺麗なゲストハウスへ向かう。ここが、一泊の間の俺たちの仮の宿になるのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺たちは瀟洒で小綺麗なゲストハウスへ向かう。{n}ここが、一泊の間の俺たちの仮の宿になるのだ。
Russian (RU): И мы направились к ухоженному, изящно простому домику для гостей.{n}Ему полагалось стать нашим временным пристанищем на ночь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nós fomos em direção à elegante casa de hóspedes.{n}Onde serão nossos quartos temporários esta noite.
Vietnamese (VI): Chúng tôi tiến về phía khu nhà khách trông gọn gàng và trang nhã.{n}Đây sẽ là nơi tạm trú của chúng tôi trong một đêm.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我們朝著典雅別緻的賓館走去。{n}這裡將會是我們一晚的暫宿之處。

Steam (ST): Kanon watched over a hedge as the guests all entered the guesthouse.
Umineko Project (UP): Kanon watched over a hedge as the guests all entered the guesthouse.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 客人一行がゲストハウスに入っていくのを、嘉音は垣根越しに見送っていた。
Russian (RU): Канон наблюдал через изгородь, как гости один за другим заходили в дом для гостей.

Umineko Project (UP): Then, he let his eyes fall on those heavy sacks of fertilizer, piled up in the wheelbarrow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, he let his eyes fall on those heavy sacks of fertilizer, piled up in the wheelbarrow.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それから、猫車に積まれた、あの重い肥料の袋に目を落とす。
Russian (RU): Затем он опустил глаза на те тяжёлые мешки с удобрением, наваленные в тачку.

Steam (ST): In his mind, he kept going over his previous mistake. Battler, big and strong, had picked up the sacks in front of him, the sacks Kanon couldn't lift himself, as if they were feathers.
Umineko Project (UP): In his mind, he kept going over his previous mistake.{n}Battler, big and strong, had picked up the sacks in front of him, the sacks he couldn't lift himself, as if they were feathers.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In his mind, he kept going over his previous mistake. Battler, big and strong, had picked up the sacks in front of him, the sacks he couldn't lift himself, as if they were feathers.
PC Japanese (JP): 脳裏に過ぎるのは、さっきのミスの時。体躯の大きい戦人が、自分が満足に持ち上げられない袋を、さも軽そうに持ち上げて見せていた。

Russian (RU): Его мысли обратились к совершённой им недавно ошибке.{n}Баттлер, большой и сильный, поднял эти мешки, практически неподъёмные для него, как пёрышки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na sua mente, ele ainda deve estar pensando no erro que havia cometido.{n}Battler, por ser grande e forte, levantou os sacos que ele não conseguia carregar, como se fossem penas.
Vietnamese (VI): Trong đầu, cậu không ngừng lặp lại những lỗi lầm vừa rồi.{n}Battler, to khỏe như vậy, đã nhấc những chiếc bao mà cậu không thể nâng nổi lên, như thể chúng nhẹ như lông hồng.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 腦海中掠過剛才犯錯時的情形。{n}他眼看著身材高大的戰人，把自己使足勁頭都抬不起來的肥料袋輕鬆抬起。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 脑海中掠过刚才犯错时的情形。{n}他眼看着身材高大的战人，把自己使足劲头都抬不起来的肥料袋轻松抬起。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nella sua mente, continuava a pensare all'errore commesso in precedenza. Battler, grande e grosso, aveva sollevato i sacchi impilati vicino a lui, quei sacchi che Kanon non poteva sollevare, come se fossero stati piume.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La sua mente rimuginava sull'errore commesso poco prima. Battler, grande e grosso com'era, aveva alzato i sacchi che Kanon non era riuscito a sollevare, come se fossero delle piume.
Turkish (TR): Aklından önceki hatasını geçirmeye devam etti.{n}İri yarı ve güçlü Battler, kendi kaldıramadığı çuvalları önünden tüy gibi kaldırmıştı.

Steam (ST): It would be extremely difficult for an outside observer to guess what emotions that favor had stirred up in Kanon.
Umineko Project (UP): It was extremely difficult for an outside observer to guess what emotions that favor had stirred up in Kanon.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was extremely difficult for an outside observer to guess what emotions that favor had stirred up in Kanon.

Steam (ST): But as far as you could tell by watching him hang his head, there was something that he just couldn't let go of.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas o máximo que você podia dizer vendo ele de costas, é que havia algo que ele simplesmente não podia deixar passar.
Vietnamese (VI): Nhưng chỉ cần nhìn từ sau lưng khi cậu cúi đầu xuống, cũng có thể thấy rằng trong lòng cậu vẫn còn điều gì đó đang vướng mắc.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過單看他那垂頭喪氣的背影，卻又讓人感到某種，也只好讓他獨自安靜一會兒的氛圍。

Turkish (TR): Ancak başını arkadan sarkıtmasını izleyerek söyleyebileceğiniz kadarıyla, aklına takılan bir şey vardı.

Steam (ST): ...Muttered words escaped his lips. But those words he murmured were so soft that they didn't reach even his own ears.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Muttered words escaped his lips.{n}But those words he murmured were so soft that they didn't reach even his own ears.

PC Japanese (JP): …ぽつりと独り言が零れる。でもそれは、呟いた自分の耳にすら届かないほどの小さなもの。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "I can handle Western design for a few days, but any longer than that and you need the good old Japanese look! Japanese people just relax best on tatami mats."
Umineko Project (UP): "I can handle the Western style for a few days, but any longer than that and you need the good old Japanese style! Japanese people just relax best on tatami mats."

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「只是兩三天的話洋風還好，但要是一直安心住下去的話那絕對得是和風才行吶！日本人吶，還是坐在榻榻米上最舒心吶。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica

Steam (ST): All the rooms seemed to be for two people. I was grateful, since I wasn't gonna be forced to share the same room with the old bastard, under the pretext that we were family.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após ser repreendida pelo George‐aniki, a Jessica não teve escolha, a não ser em pensar no que tinha dito.
Vietnamese (VI): Bị anh George trách mắng, Jessica không còn cách nào khác ngoài việc rút lại lời nói thiếu suy nghĩ của mình.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 被讓治大哥責備了的朱志香，也只好收回惡言。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 被让治大哥责备了的朱志香，也只好收回恶言。
Indonesian (IDN): Setelah ditegur George-aniki, Jessica tidak punya pilihan selain menarik kembali ucapannya yang sembrono.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo essere stata rimproverata da George-aniki, Jessica non ebbe altra scelta che rimangiarsi il suo commento sconsiderato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopo essere stata rimproverata dal fratellone George, Jessica non potè fare altro che rimangiarsi le sue parole offensive.
Turkish (TR): George-aniki tarafından azarlandıktan sonra Jessica'nın düşüncesizce söylediği sözleri geri almaktan başka çaresi kalmamıştı.

Steam (ST): The Ushiromiya family was wealthy beyond belief, but of course, that meant all its members were a bit strange...and completely out of touch with the world at large.
Umineko Project (UP): The Ushiromiya family was wealthy beyond belief, but that, of course, meant that all its members were eccentric people, completely at odds with the rest of society.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Ushiromiya family was wealthy beyond belief, but that, of course, meant that all its members were weird people who cut themselves off from the world entirely.
PC Japanese (JP): 右代宮家は大富豪だが、ってことはやはり世間とは完全にズレてる曲者ぞろいだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 右代宮家は大富豪だが、ってことはやはり世間とは完全にズレてる曲者ぞろいだ。
Russian (RU): Семья Уширомия была богата сверх всякой меры, что, в свою очередь, означало, что все её члены были странными людьми, предпочитающими полностью отрезать себя от окружающего мира.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A família Ushiromiya era muito rica, e isso significa que todos os seus membros eram pessoas excêntrica, completamente fora dos padrões da sociedade.
Vietnamese (VI): Gia tộc Ushiromiya giàu có đến mức khó tin, nhưng tất nhiên, điều đó cũng đồng nghĩa với việc tất cả các thành viên đều là những con người lập dị, hoàn toàn lệch nhịp so với phần còn lại của xã hội.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 右代宮家是富豪之家，……理所當然聚集的都是些與世間普通人完全不同的狡猾之人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 右代宫家是富豪之家，……理所当然聚集的都是些与世间普通人完全不同的狡猾之人。
Indonesian (IDN): Keluarga Ushiromiya sangat kaya, tapi itu berarti semua anggotanya adalah orang-orang eksentrik yang bertolak belakang dengan masyarakat.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La famiglia Ushiromiya era incredibilmente ricca, ma ciò, ovviamente, significava che tutti i suoi membri erano strane persone che si erano completamente estraniate dal mondo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La famiglia Ushiromiya navigava nell'oro, ma ciò ovviamente voleva dire che era composta da persone eccentriche e completamente fuori dal mondo.
Turkish (TR): Ushiromiya ailesi inanılmayacak kadar zengindi, ancak bu elbette tüm üyelerinin toplumun geri kalanıyla tamamen çelişen eksantrik insanlar olduğu anlamına geliyordu.

Steam (ST): And at the top of the chain, the Family Head—our Grandfather—seemed especially strange and terrifying, even for our family.
Umineko Project (UP): The Head of the family, standing at its peak—in other words, our Grandfather—seemed to be a particularly eccentric and terrifying person, even for our family.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Head of the Family, standing at its peak - in other words, our Grandfather - seemed to be a particularly weird and terrifying person, even for our family.
PC Japanese (JP): その頂点に立つ右代宮家当主、つまり俺たちの祖父さまは、その中でも特に曲者で恐ろしいお人らしい。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その頂点に立つ右代宮家当主、つまり俺たちの祖父さまは、その中でも特に曲者で恐ろしいお人らしい。
Russian (RU): Глава же семьи, занимающий в ней самое высокое положение, то есть наш дедушка, был крайне странным, да ещё и внушающим страх, даже по меркам нашей семьи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O chefe da família, em seu auge — em outras palavras, o nosso avô — parece ser particularmente excêntrico e assustador, mesmo para a nossa família.
Vietnamese (VI): Tuy tôi đã thấy gia tộc chúng tôi nhìn chung là lập dị rồi, nhưng người đứng đầu gia tộc – tức là ông nội chúng tôi – dường như còn đặc biệt lập dị và đáng sợ hơn thế.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 站在家族頂點的右代宮家當主，也就是我們的祖父，似乎就是他們之中最老奸巨滑、令人恐懼的那一個。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 站在家族顶点的右代宫家当主，也就是我们的祖父，似乎就是他们之中最老奸巨滑、令人恐惧的那一个。
Indonesian (IDN): Kepala keluarga, yang berada di puncak - yaitu Kakek kami - tampaknya orang yang sangat eksentrik dan menakutkan bahkan untuk standar keluarga kami.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il capofamiglia, essendone alla vetta, in altre parole nostro Nonno, sembrava essere una persona particolarmente stramba e terrificante, anche per la nostra famiglia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Trovandosi al vertice, il capofamiglia, ovvero nostro nonno, sembrava essere il più eccentrico e terribile tra tutti.
Turkish (TR): Ailenin en tepesinde duran aile reisi—yani Büyükbabamız—bizim ailemiz için bile özellikle eksantrik ve ürkütücü bir kişiydi.

Steam (ST): Dad said he was getting a stomachache earlier, ...and I imagine that reflected the honest feelings of all the adults here today.
Umineko Project (UP): Dad had said he was getting a stomachache earlier, but I guess that was what all the adults who came here today were actually feeling.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Dad had said he was getting a stomachache earlier..., but I guess that was what all the adults who came here today were actually feeling.
PC Japanese (JP): さっき親父が、胃がキリキリして…と言ったが、それは今日ここに来ている大人たちの率直な気持ちだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): さっき親父が、胃がキリキリして…と言ったが、それは今日ここに来ている大人たちの率直な気持ちだろう。
Russian (RU): Отец обмолвился, что у него разболелся живот, но я думаю все взрослые, приехавшие сегодня сюда, чувствуют себя аналогичным образом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Meu pai disse que estava ficando com dor de barriga mais cedo, mas eu acho que na verdade, ele está se sentindo assim porque todos os adultos estão reunidos aqui hoje.
Vietnamese (VI): Bố tôi vừa than đau bụng ban nãy, nhưng có lẽ đó cũng là cảm giác chung của tất cả người lớn khi đến đây hôm nay.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 剛才我老爸說他胃疼得不得了，恐怕那就是今天這裡所有大人們內心的真實寫照。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 刚才我老爸说他胃疼得不得了，恐怕那就是今天这里所有大人们内心的真实写照。
Indonesian (IDN): Ayah bilang tadi perutnya sakit, tapi kurasa itu yang sebenarnya dirasakan semua orang dewasa yang datang hari ini.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Papà ha detto che gli stava venendo mal di stomaco prima... ma penso che sia la sensazione che stavano provando tutti gli adulti che erano venuti qui oggi.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Papà prima aveva detto... che lo stomaco gli faceva un male cane, ma penso che tutti gli adulti venuti qui provassero la stessa identica sensazione.
Turkish (TR): Babam daha önce karnının ağrıdığını söylemişti ama sanırım bugün buraya gelen tüm yetişkinler aslında bunu hissediyordu.

Steam (ST): No doubt they were jealous of us grandchildren, who could just play around and laugh without a care.
Umineko Project (UP): No doubt they were jealous of us, the grandchildren, just playing and laughing without a care.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No doubt they were jealous of us, the grandchildren, just playing and laughing without a care.
PC Japanese (JP): 孫である俺たちがきゃっきゃと遊んでいるのが、さぞや羨ましいに違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 孫である俺たちがきゃっきゃと遊んでいるのが、さぞや羨ましいに違いない。
Russian (RU): Они наверняка завидовали нам, внукам, предающимся беззаботному веселью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sem dúvida, eles nos invejam, os netos, que podem apenas brincar e rir sem se importar com as coisas.
Vietnamese (VI): Chắc chắn họ đang ghen tị với bọn tôi – lũ cháu của ông – những đứa trẻ chỉ biết chơi đùa vô tư.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看著孫輩的我們無憂無慮地打成一片，想必他們一定很羨慕吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看着孙辈的我们无忧无虑地打成一片，想必他们一定很羡慕吧。
Indonesian (IDN): Pasti mereka iri pada kami, cucu-cucunya, yang hanya bermain dan tertawa tanpa beban.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Senza dubbio erano gelosi di noi, i nipoti, che giocavamo e ridevamo senza preoccupazioni.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Erano senz'altro invidiosi dei nipoti che giocavano e ridacchiavano.
Turkish (TR): Hiç şüphesiz, umursamadan oynayıp gülen biz çocukları kıskanıyorlardı.

Steam (ST): From the stories Dad told me, the Family Head was a violent man who ruled with his fists, beating his children, even his daughters, mercilessly with a wooden sword.
Umineko Project (UP): From the stories Dad told me, the head of the family was a violent man who rained blows on his sons with his own fists and even beat his daughters mercilessly with a wooden sword.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): From the stories Dad told me, the Head of the Family was a violent man who rained blows on his sons with his own fists and even beat his daughters mercilessly with a wooden sword.
PC Japanese (JP): 親父に聞かされた話じゃ、何でもかんでも鉄拳制裁で、娘であろうと木刀で容赦なく打ち据える暴力当主だったそうだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 親父に聞かされた話じゃ、何でもかんでも鉄拳制裁で、娘であろうと木刀で容赦なく打ち据える暴力当主だったそうだ。
Russian (RU): Судя по рассказам отца, глава семьи был человеком бешеного нрава, безжалостно колотившим своих сыновей кулаками и даже дочерей деревянным мечом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Pelas histórias que meu pai me contava, o chefe da família era um homem violento, que levantava o punho para seus filhos e até batia com uma espada de madeira, sem piedade.
Vietnamese (VI): Theo những gì bố kể, người đứng đầu gia tộc là một gã đàn ông vũ phu, từng không xót tay mà đánh con trai, và thậm chí còn đập con gái không thương tiếc bằng kiếm gỗ.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 聽老爸說過，爺爺是個不問緣由一律拳腳相加，就算是女兒也會毫不留情地用木刀痛打的暴君當主。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 听老爸说过，爷爷是个不问缘由一律拳脚相加，就算是女儿也会毫不留情地用木刀痛打的暴君当主。
Indonesian (IDN): Dari cerita Ayah, kepala keluarga ini pria kasar yang memukuli anak-anaknya dengan tangan sendiri dan bahkan tidak segan memukuli putrinya dengan pedang kayu.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dalle storie che mi raccontava Papà, il capofamiglia era un uomo violento che faceva piovere botte sui suoi figli coi suoi pugni e colpiva perfino le sue figlie senza pietà con una spada di legno.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Da quello che mi raccontava il vecchio, il capofamiglia era un uomo violento che adoperava punizioni corporali in ogni occasione, e li colpiva crudelmente con una spada di legno, senza fare distinzione tra figlio o figlia.
Turkish (TR): Babamın bana anlattığı hikayelere göre, ailenin reisi, oğullarına kendi yumruklarıyla darbeler yağdıran ve hatta kızlarını tahta bir kılıçla acımasızca döven vahşi bir adamdı.

Steam (ST): If he was so strict and uptight about that, why couldn't he have been a little more conservative with his kids' names?
Umineko Project (UP): If he was such a staunch traditionalist with his kids, why wasn't he the same with their names?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If he was such a hard-ass with his kids, why wasn't he the same with their names?
PC Japanese (JP): そんだけの硬派さがあったら、息子たちの名前ももう少し硬派にしたらどうだよ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そんだけの硬派さがあったら、息子たちの名前ももう少し硬派にしたらどうだよ。
Russian (RU): Ну, раз уж он держал своих детей в ежовых рукавицах, то что ему стоило подойти к нашим именам по‐человечески?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se ele era tão tradicional e rígido com seus filhos, por que não também com os seus nomes?
Vietnamese (VI): Nếu đã "truyền thống" đến mức đó với con cái, sao ông không để tên của tụi nó cũng "truyền thống" luôn đi?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然為人都這麼硬派了，幹嘛不把兒女們的名字也取得硬派點啊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然为人都这么硬派了，干嘛不把儿女们的名字也取得硬派点啊。
Indonesian (IDN): Jika dia sangat tradisional dengan anak-anaknya, mengapa tidak dengan nama mereka?
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se era così duro con i suoi bambini, perché non lo era ugualmente con i loro nomi?
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Se era così tradizionalista con i suoi bambini, perché non lo è stato un po' di più anche con i loro nomi?
Turkish (TR): Madem çocuklarına karşı bu kadar katı bir gelenekçiydi, neden onların isimleri konusunda da aynı şeyi yapmıyordu?

Steam (ST): Because of that, even us grandkids have had to suffer.
Umineko Project (UP): Because of that, even us grandkids have to suffer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because of that, it's a pain even for us grandkids.
PC Japanese (JP): お陰で孫まで迷惑してるぜ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): お陰で孫まで迷惑してるぜ。
Russian (RU): Нам, его внукам, с ними одна морока.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por causa disso, mesmo nós, seus netos, sofremos com isso.
Vietnamese (VI): Vì thế này, thì đến cả các cháu như tụi tôi cũng phải gánh chịu cái phong cách đặt tên ấy.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 托他的福就連孫子孫女們都跟著遭殃。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 托他的福就连孙子孙女们都跟着遭殃。
Indonesian (IDN): Karena itu, bahkan kami cucunya harus menderita.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E dal momento che non lo era, noi nipoti dobbiamo portarne il fardello.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per colpa sua, anche i suoi nipoti portavano questo fardello...
Turkish (TR): Bu yüzden biz torunları bile acı çekmek zorunda kalıyoruz.

Steam (ST): ...Anyway, I can't say I have any trouble believing those terrifying stories about him.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Well, I have absolutely no trouble believing the terrifying image they paint of him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Well, I'm not the least unsettled by his terrifying image.
PC Japanese (JP): ……まぁそのおっそろしいイメージには違和感は寸分もない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……まぁそのおっそろしいイメージには違和感は寸分もない。
Russian (RU): Что касается меня... Его внушающий страх образ ничуть не выбивает меня из колеи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Bem, eu não tenho absolutamente nenhum problema em acreditar na imagem assustadora dele que me contaram.
Vietnamese (VI): ......Mà thôi, tôi hoàn toàn tin vào cái hình ảnh đáng sợ mà họ miêu tả về ông.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不過這可怕的印象倒是一點都不奇怪。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不过这可怕的印象倒是一点都不奇怪。
Indonesian (IDN): ......Yah, aku sama sekali tidak sulit mempercayai gambaran menakutkan tentang dirinya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Beh, non mi sento per niente turbato dalla sua terrificante immagine.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Beh, non mi stupiva affatto questo suo ritratto terrificante.
Turkish (TR): ......Onunla ilgili çizdikleri korkunç imaja inanmakta hiç zorluk çekmiyorum.

Steam (ST): I don't remember meeting him very often, but I think I recall him looking extremely grumpy all the time, always making people cower with that sharp gaze of his.
Umineko Project (UP): I don't have many memories of meeting him over the years, but I remember his face was full of menacing thunder‐clouds, always making the people around him shrink away with a sharp look.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I don't have many memories of meeting him over the years, but I remember Grandpa, his face always full of menacing thunder-clouds, always making his surroundings shrink away with a sharp look.
PC Japanese (JP): 俺も何度も会った記憶はないが、非常に気難しそうな顔をした祖父さんで、いっつも鋭い眼光で周りを萎縮させていたっけ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 俺も何度も会った記憶はないが、非常に気難しそうな顔をした祖父さんで、いっつも鋭い眼光で周りを萎縮させていたっけ。
Russian (RU): Моя память сохранила мало воспоминаний о встречах с ним, но я помню дедово лицо, всегда таившее угрозу, как грозовая туча — молнию, а всё, что его окружало, съеживалось под его колючим взглядом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não tenho muitas memórias de ter me encontrado com ele, mas eu me lembro de seu rosto ameaçador, sempre fazendo com que as pessoas ao seu redor se afastassem, com um olhar afiado.
Vietnamese (VI): Tôi không có nhiều ký ức về những lần gặp ông suốt những năm qua, nhưng tôi nhớ khuôn mặt ông lúc nào cũng như mây đen vần vũ, chỉ một ánh mắt cũng đủ khiến mọi người xung quanh co rúm lại.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 記憶中我沒怎麼見過他，只記得爺爺他擺著張非常難伺候的臉，總是以銳利的眼神讓周圍的人直不起腰來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 记忆中我没怎么见过他，只记得爷爷他摆着张非常难伺候的脸，总是以锐利的眼神让周围的人直不起腰来。
Indonesian (IDN): Aku tidak banyak ingat pertemuan dengannya selama ini, tapi aku ingat wajahnya selalu berawan, membuat orang di sekitarnya ciut dengan pandangannya yang tajam.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non ho ricordi di averlo incontrato in questi anni, ma ricordo il Nonno, la sua faccia sempre ricolma di nuvoloni minacciosi, che faceva atterrire sempre l'ambiente attorno a lui con uno sguardo tagliente.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Io non ricordo di averlo incontrato molte volte, ma mi sembrava che fosse un nonno estremamente scorbutico, che faceva atterrire con uno sguardo tagliente chi si trovava in sua presenza.
Turkish (TR): Yıllar içinde onu gördüğüme dair çok fazla anım yok, ama yüzünün tehditkâr gök gürültüsü bulutlarıyla dolu olduğunu ve etrafındaki insanların keskin bir bakışla kaçışmasına neden olduğunu hatırlıyorum.

Steam (ST): I remember that the room's atmosphere got so tense whenever he was around, you couldn't even breathe.
Umineko Project (UP): I remember that the room's atmosphere got so tense whenever he was around, you couldn't even breathe.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I remember that the room's atmosphere got so tense whenever he was around, you couldn't even breathe.
PC Japanese (JP): 祖父さんがいる時の張り詰めた空気は、窒息しかねない辛いものだったことも思い出す。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 祖父さんがいる時の張り詰めた空気は、窒息しかねない辛いものだったことも思い出す。
Russian (RU): Я помню, что воздух в комнате, где он присутствовал, так наполнялся напряжением, что было трудно дышать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu lembro que a atmosfera da sala sempre ficava tensa quando ele estava por perto, mal dava para respirar.
Vietnamese (VI): Tôi nhớ không khí trong phòng mỗi khi ông xuất hiện căng đến mức không thể thở nổi.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 爺爺在場時的緊張氣氛，簡直能令人窒息。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 爷爷在场时的紧张气氛，简直能令人窒息。
Indonesian (IDN): Aku ingat suasana ruangan menjadi sangat tegang ketika dia ada, sampai sulit bernapas.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ricordo che quando era nei paraggi, l'atmosfera nella stanza diventava così tesa che non si riusciva neanche a respirare.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ricordo anche che quando c'era il nonno, l'atmosfera nella stanza diventava così opprimente, che a stento si riusciva a respirare.
Turkish (TR): O etraftayken odanın atmosferinin çok gerginleştiğini, nefes bile alamadığınızı hatırlıyorum.

Steam (ST): What my dad said about me being the guest of honor now carries a little more oomph for me.

Umineko Project (UP): "So, brats, what're you gonna do? Are you cousins just gonna stay here and chat?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hey brats, what'll you do? Are you cousins just gonna stay here and chat?"

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「おいガキども、お前らはどうする。ここでいとこ同士、おしゃべりでもしてるか？」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ehi, marmocchi, voi che fate? Resterete qui a chiaccherare fra cugini?"

Steam (ST): It seemed they were heading to the mansion to announce their arrival.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed they were heading to the mansion to announce their arrival.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed they were heading to the mansion to announce their arrival.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 大人们好像是要去大屋打招呼。

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Pare che stessero per andare alla villa per annunciare il loro arrivo...

Steam (ST): ...Normally, they would make us follow them and greet everyone together, but if that had been the case, Dad would've just told us to come, and that'd be the end of it.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Normally, we would have had to follow them and greet everyone together, but if that had been the case, Dad would just have said "You guys come too!" and been done with it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Normally, we would have had to follow them and greet everyone together, but if that had been the case, Dad would just have said 'You guys come!' and finished it.
PC Japanese (JP): …筋なら、付いていって一緒に挨拶するべきなんだが、そうなら親父はお前らも来いと一言、言って終わりだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …筋なら、付いていって一緒に挨拶するべきなんだが、そうなら親父はお前らも来いと一言、言って終わりだ。
Russian (RU): ...По большому счёту нам, вроде как, полагалось идти с ними, чтобы поприветствовать всех вместе, но тогда бы отец просто сказал: "Пошли, ребята!" — и всё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Normalmente, nós os seguiríamos para cumprimentar a todos juntos, mas se esse fosse o caso, meu pai diria algo como "Vocês vêm junto também!" e faríamos isso.
Vietnamese (VI): ...Bình thường, tụi tôi cũng sẽ phải đi theo và chào hỏi chung, nhưng nếu vậy thì bố tôi chỉ đơn giản bảo "Các con đi cùng luôn đi!" là xong chuyện.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …按道理我們是應該跟著一起去打招呼的。不過若是這樣的話，老爸只需說一句“你們快過來”就行了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …按道理我们是应该跟着一起去打招呼的。不过若是这样的话，老爸只需说一句“你们快过来”就行了。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Biasanya, kami harus ikut dan menyapa bersama, tapi jika itu yang terjadi, Ayah hanya akan bilang "Kalian ikut juga!" dan selesai.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Normalmente, avremmo dovuto seguirli e salutare tutti quanti insieme, ma in quel caso, Papà avrebbe semplicemente detto ‘Venite anche voi!’ e avrebbe chiuso il discorso.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Normalmente avremmo dovuto seguirli e presentarci tutti quanti insieme, ma in quel caso, il vecchio avrebbe semplicemente detto un ‘venite anche voi!’, e avrebbe chiuso il discorso.
Turkish (TR): ...Normalde onları takip etmemiz ve herkesi birlikte karşılamamız gerekirdi, ama öyle olsaydı babam "Siz de geliyorsunuz!" der ve işi bitirirdi.

Steam (ST): He's saying it's okay if we don't come, so what'll we do?
Umineko Project (UP): He's telling us that it's alright if we don't come... So what'll we do?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He was telling us that it was alright if we didn't come, so what'll we do?

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 来ないのも勝手だぞと言ってくれてるし、どうしよう？

Vietnamese (VI): Mà lần này thì tụi tôi không đi cũng chẳng sao... Vậy giờ làm gì đây?

Chinese Simplified (CN): 反正他也加了一句“不来也无所谓”，要不要去呢？

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ci stava dicendo che andava bene anche se non fossimo venuti, quindi dov'era il problema?
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ci stava dicendo che anche se non fossimo venuti sarebbe andata bene, quindi che dovremmo fare?
Turkish (TR): Gelmezsek sorun olmayacağını söylüyor... Peki ne yapacağız?

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Logo já vai estar na hora do almoço de qualquer forma. É melhor deixar as crianças aqui. Além disso, se o pior acontecer, ao menos elas têm a chance de se divertirem juntas."
Vietnamese (VI): "Cũng sắp tới giờ ăn trưa rồi. Cho các cháu thư giãn ở đây chút cũng tốt. Với lại, nếu mà xui lắm thì, có khi đây là lần cuối tụi nó được chơi ngoài trời."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「反正馬上就要吃午飯了吶。就讓孩子們在這兒放鬆一下吧。而且錯過現在的話搞不好就沒機會去外面玩了吶。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「反正马上就要吃午饭了呐。就让孩子们在这儿放松一下吧。而且错过现在的话搞不好就没机会去外面玩了呐。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Sebentar lagi makan siang juga. Lebih baik biarkan anak-anak bersantai di sini. Lagipula, jika yang terburuk terjadi, ini mungkin kesempatan terakhir mereka bermain di luar."

Umineko Project (UP): "Maria, you house‐sit for Mama, okay? You behave yourself and wait here."

Steam (ST): George-aniki noticed this immediately and gave a clear reply for all of us cousins.
Umineko Project (UP): George‐aniki realized that immediately, and gave a clear reply for all of us.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): George-aniki soon realized it and gave a clear reply for all of us.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 譲治の兄貴はそれをすぐに察し、いとこ代表として明快に返事をした。

Vietnamese (VI): Anh George lập tức nhận ra điều đó và trả lời dứt khoát thay mặt cả bọn.

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "Well then, we'll accept your offer and house-sit. We've got lots of stories to tell each other, after being away for a year."
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, we'll accept your offer and house‐sit. We have lots of stories to tell each other, after a year."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Well, we'll accept your offer and house-sit. We have lots of stories to tell each other, after a year."
PC Japanese (JP): 「じゃあ、僕たちはお言葉に甘えて、留守番してようか。１年ぶりに積もる話もあるしね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「じゃあ、僕たちはお言葉に甘えて、留守番してようか。１年ぶりに積もる話もあるしね」
Russian (RU): "Что ж, в таком случае, и мы тоже тут посидим. У нас накопилось множество историй за тот год, что мы не видели друг друга, которые мы можем рассказать друг другу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Bem, nós aceitamos a oferta de vocês e vamos ficar por aqui. Nós temos muitas histórias para contar uns para os outros, depois de um ano."
Vietnamese (VI): "Vậy thì tụi cháu xin nhận lời và ở lại trông nhà. Một năm không gặp, tụi cháu có nhiều chuyện để nói lắm."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「既然這樣，我們恭敬不如從命，不如就留在這裡看家吧。正好也積了一年份的話想聊呢。」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Bene, accetteremo la tua offerta e controlleremo la casa. Abbiamo un sacco di storie da raccontarci, dopo un anno."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Bene, noi approfitteremo dell'occasione e resteremo in casa. Avremmo un sacco di storie da raccontarci, visto che è passato un anno."
Turkish (TR): "Pekala, teklifinizi kabul edeceğiz ve odada kalacağız. Bir yıl aradan sonra birbirimize anlatacak bir sürü hikâyemiz var."

Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah, yeah. I'll take care of the house like a good little boy."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Yeah, yeah. I'll take care of the house like a good boy."

Steam (ST): Her kind words got Natsuhi to soften her expression for just a moment, but it wasn't enough to melt her stony gaze, hardened as it was by long years of mental stress.
Umineko Project (UP): Her consideration made Natsuhi soften her expression for just a moment, but it wasn't enough to undo the many years of anxiety that had curdled her expression into one of bland indifference...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her consideration made Natsuhi soften her expression for just a moment, but it wasn't enough to make her let down her guard, which was constructed around her long-held anxiety.
PC Japanese (JP): その気遣いに夏妃は一瞬だけ表情を和ませるが、長年の気苦労によって凝り固まってしまったその淡白な表情を解すほどには至らなかった…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その気遣いに夏妃は一瞬だけ表情を和ませるが、長年の気苦労によって凝り固まってしまったその淡白な表情を解すほどには至らなかった…。
Russian (RU): Лицо Нацухи чуть смягчилось от проявленной к ней Розой заботы, но лишь на мгновение. Этого было явно недостаточно, чтобы ослабить её настороженность, подпитываемую долго сдерживаемой тревогой.

Vietnamese (VI): Sự quan tâm của cô khiến Natsuhi cảm thấy dịu lại một chút, nhưng không đủ để cô xóa tan nét lo âu hằn trên gương mặt của mình, vốn đã bị bao năm căng thẳng hóa thành như vô cảm...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這份關心使得夏妃露出了片刻舒緩的表情，但這種程度還不足以緩解，因長年辛苦操勞而凝固住的淡漠神情…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这份关心使得夏妃露出了片刻舒缓的表情，但这种程度还不足以缓解，因长年辛苦操劳而凝固住的淡漠神情…。
Indonesian (IDN): Sikapnya membuat ekspresi Natsuhi melunak sejenak, tapi tidak cukup untuk menghapus kecemasan bertahun-tahun yang telah mengeras di wajahnya...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sua considerazione portò Natsuhi a rilassare la sua espressione solo per un attimo, ma non era abbastanza per farle abbassare la guardia, costruita attorno alla sua longeva ansia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): La sua accortezza fece rilassare per un attimo il volto di Natsuhi, ma non era abbastanza per sciogliere la sua espressione indifferente, irrigiditasi a causa dei lunghi anni di forte stress.
Turkish (TR): Onun bu düşüncesi Natsuhi'nin yüz ifadesini bir anlığına yumuşatmasına neden oldu, ama bu, yüz ifadesini yumuşak bir kayıtsızlığa dönüştüren uzun yılların endişesini ortadan kaldırmaya yetmedi...

Steam (ST): Even under normal circumstances, Eva sometimes failed to choose her words carefully, but her comments aimed at Natsuhi contained shards of obvious malice, though she hid it with a smile.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): That's right, the real point of studyin' is to practice researchin' stuff on your own whenever you bump into something ya don't know! If ya can't do that, ya can't be useful to society! I'm not talkin' about math or writin'. Ya gotta learn how to learn!"
Umineko Project (UP): "That's right, the real point of studyin' is to train yourself in the art of researchin' what you don't know! If you can't do that, you can't be useful to society! I'm not talkin' about math or writin'. You need to learn how to learn!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's right, the real point of studyin' is to train yourself by researchin' what you don't know! If you can't do that, you can't be useful to society! I'm not talkin' about math or writin'. You need to learn how to learn!"

Russian (RU): "Да, учебу можно сравнить с тренировкой, когда ты обращаешься к чему‐то, что ты не знаешь, и извлекаешь из этого уроки! Если ты на подобное не способен, то не сможешь пригодиться обществу! И я тут говорю не о математике или письме, а о том, как научиться учиться и узнавать больше!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso mesmo, o verdadeiro motivo de estudar é treinar a si mesmo na arte de pesquisar aquilo que você não sabe! Se você não puder fazer isso, você não vai ser útil para a sociedade! Não estou falando sobre matemática ou redação. Você precisa aprender como aprender!"
Vietnamese (VI): "Đúng rồi, mục đích thật sự của việc học là để rèn luyện khả năng tự nghiên cứu những điều mình chưa biết! Nếu không làm được điều đó, thì chẳng giúp được gì cho xã hội cả! Anh không nói đến toán hay văn gì đâu. Quan trọng là phải "học được cách học"!"

Turkish (TR): "Bu doğru, ders çalışmanın asıl amacı bilmediğin şeyleri araştırma sanatında kendini eğitmektir! Eğer bunu yapamazsanız, topluma faydalı olamazsınız! Matematikten ya da yazmaktan bahsetmiyorum. Nasıl öğreneceğini öğrenmelisin!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...That's splendid. I wish our Jessica could understand that as well. If she is to be the heiress of the Ushiromiya family, then at this rate-"
Umineko Project (UP): "...That's splendid. It would be nice if our Jessica could understand that, though. I don't mean this too seriously, but as it is, as an heiress of the Ushiromiya family, she's—"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...That's splendid. It would be nice if our Jessica could understand that, though. As it is now, she doesn't at all, but as the heiress of the Ushiromiya family,"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…ご立派ですわ。うちの朱志香にもそれが理解できればいいんだけど。今のままでは、とてもじゃないけど、右代宮家の跡取りとしては、」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…ご立派ですわ。うちの朱志香にもそれが理解できればいいんだけど。今のままでは、とてもじゃないけど、右代宮家の跡取りとしては、」
Russian (RU): "...Прекрасная мысль. Было бы неплохо, если бы Джессика смогла её осознать. Сейчас ей вряд ли это удастся, но как наследнице семьи Уширомия..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Isso é esplêndido. Seria ótimo se a nossa Jessica pudesse entender isso também. Eu não quero que ela leve tão a sério, mas ainda assim, ela é a sucessora da família Ushiromiya, ela—"
Vietnamese (VI): "...Tuyệt vời quá. Giá mà Jessica nhà chị cũng hiểu điều đó thì tốt biết mấy. Chị nói thế không phải để chỉ trích con bé đâu, nhưng với tư cách là người thừa kế của gia tộc Ushiromiya thì–"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…說得真是太精彩了。要是我家的朱志香也能理解這點就好了。雖然現在還不算很不成器，但作為右代宮本家的繼承人，還是有些……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…说得真是太精彩了。要是我家的朱志香也能理解这点就好了。虽然现在还不算很不成器，但作为右代宫本家的继承人，还是有些……」
Indonesian (IDN): "...Itu hebat. Akan baik jika Jessica kami bisa memahaminya. Aku tidak terlalu serius, tapi sebagai pewaris keluarga Ushiromiya, dia—"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... È splendido. Sarebbe bello se la nostra Jessica potesse capirlo. Per adesso, non l'ha capito per niente, in quanto erede della famiglia Ushiromiya."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Che discorso esemplare. Sarebbe bello se potesse capirlo anche la nostra Jessica. Ora come ora non ci siamo, ma per essere l'erede della famiglia Ushiromiya—"
Turkish (TR): "...Bu harika. Jessica'mız da bunu anlayabilseydi iyi olurdu. Bunu çok ciddiye almıyorum ama Ushiromiya ailesinin bir varisi olarak, o—"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "Do you really have to force her into becoming the successor? After all, a woman has to find a woman's happiness. Parents shouldn't force such things on their children, don't you think?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Do you really have to force her into becoming the successor? Women have to find their own happiness. Parents shouldn't be deciding that for their children, right?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Do you really have to force her into becoming the successor? Women have to find their own happiness. Parents shouldn't be deciding that for their children, right?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「いいじゃないの、無理に跡取りにしなくても。女には女の幸せというものもあるんだしぃ。それを親が押し付けちゃ悪いわよぅ？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「いいじゃないの、無理に跡取りにしなくても。女には女の幸せというものもあるんだしぃ。それを親が押し付けちゃ悪いわよぅ？」
Russian (RU): "Неужели тебе так необходимо заставить её стать наследницей? Женщины должны обретать собственное счастье. Родителям не следует решать этот вопрос за своих детей, разве нет?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você vai mesmo forçar ela a se tornar a sucessora? Mulheres precisam encontrar a sua própria felicidade. Os pais não deveriam decidir as coisas pelos filhos, certo?"
Vietnamese (VI): "Chị thật sự cần phải ép buộc nó trở thành người thừa kế sao? Phụ nữ phải tự tìm thấy hạnh phúc cho riêng mình chứ. Cha mẹ không nên quyết định điều đó thay cho con cái, đúng không?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這不也挺好嗎，不用勉強去做繼承人。女人也有女人自己的幸福。做父母的強逼她可不好哦？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这不也挺好吗，不用勉强去做继承人。女人也有女人自己的幸福。做父母的强逼她可不好哦？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Apakah kamu harus memaksanya menjadi penerus? Wanita harus mencari kebahagiaannya sendiri. Orang tua tidak seharusnya memutuskan itu untuk anak mereka, bukan?"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Devi davvero forzarla a diventare il successore? Le donne devono trovare la propria felicità. I genitori non dovrebbero deciderla per i proprio figli, giusto?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Suvvia, devi proprio costringerla a diventare l'erede? Dopotutto, una donna deve trovare la propria felicità. I genitori non dovrebbero imporre cose del genere, non credi?"
Turkish (TR): "Gerçekten onu varis olmaya zorlamak zorunda mısınız? Kadınlar kendi mutluluklarını kendileri bulmalı. Ebeveynler çocukları için buna karar vermemeli, değil mi?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "Hold your horses, Eva. Each family has its own way of raising their kids. You shouldn't be pushy."
Umineko Project (UP): "Hold your horses, Eva. Each family has its way to raise their children. You shouldn't be pushy."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Hold your horses, Eva. Each family has its way to raise their children. You shouldn't be pushy."
PC Japanese (JP): 「よさんか、絵羽。子供の育て方は家それぞれや。押し付けがましいのはあかんで。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「よさんか、絵羽。子供の育て方は家それぞれや。押し付けがましいのはあかんで」
Russian (RU): "Сбавь обороты, Ева. Каждая семья растит своих детей по‐своему. Не стоит лезть в чужой монастырь со своим уставом."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Dá um tempo, Eva. Cada família tem a sua forma de criar seus filhos. Você não deveria se intrometer."
Vietnamese (VI): "Bình tĩnh nào, Eva. Mỗi gia đình đều có cách dạy con riêng mà. Em đừng áp đặt quá."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「別這樣說吶，繪羽。孩子的教育方式家家都不同。你可不能這麼強加於人。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「别这样说呐，绘羽。孩子的教育方式家家都不同。你可不能这么强加于人。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Tunggu dulu, Eva. Setiap keluarga punya cara sendiri membesarkan anak. Kamu seharusnya tidak memaksa."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ferma i cavalli, Eva. Ogni famiglia ha il suo modo di crescere i loro figli. {n}Non dovresti essere aggressiva."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Finiscila, Eva. Ogni famiglia ha il proprio modo di crescere i propri figli.{n}Non insistere."
Turkish (TR): "Sakin ol Eva. Her aile çocuklarını kendi yöntemleriyle yetiştirir. Zorlayıcı olmamalısın."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Steam (ST): "I'm sorry. Natsuhi nee-san, don't take it the wrong way."
Umineko Project (UP): "I'm sorry. Natsuhi nee‐san, don't take it the wrong way."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I'm sorry. Natsuhi nee-san, don't take it the wrong way."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ごめんなさい。夏妃姉さんも気を悪くしないでね」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Me desculpa. Natsuhi nee‐san, não entenda mal."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对不起。夏妃姐姐也请不要生气哦。」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Vi chiedo scusa. Anche a te, Natsuhi-san, non prendertela, ok?"

Steam (ST): Though the light shining in through the window was quite warm despite the cloudy weather, there was a dark mood about the room, ...which was probably causing headaches for more than just Natsuhi.
Umineko Project (UP): Though the light shining in through the window was quite warm despite the cloudy weather, there was a dark mood about the room, ...which probably caused headaches for other people besides Natsuhi.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Though the light shining in through the window was quite warm despite the cloudy weather, there was a dark mood about the room, ...which probably caused headaches for other people besides Natsuhi.
PC Japanese (JP): 窓から射す明かりは、曇天と言えどこんなにも温かなのに、室内の空気は澱んでいて、…夏妃ならずとも鈍い頭痛を感じさせるような気がした。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 窓から射す明かりは、曇天と言えどこんなにも温かなのに、室内の空気は澱んでいて、…夏妃ならずとも鈍い頭痛を感じさせるような気がした。
Russian (RU): И хотя, несмотря на облачность, в окно лился тёплый свет, в комнате витало мрачное настроение, наверняка вызывавшее головную боль не только у Нацухи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Embora uma brilhante e calorosa luz entrasse pela janela, mesmo com o tempo nublado, havia uma atmosfera pesada na sala, ...o que provavelmente estava causando dores de cabeça aos outros também.
Vietnamese (VI): Dù ánh sáng ngoài cửa sổ khá ấm áp trong khi trời đầy mây, không khí trong phòng lại mang một màu sắc u ám, ...có lẽ điều đó khiến không chỉ mình Natsuhi cảm thấy nhức đầu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說是陰天，從窗外照射進的陽光卻還是那樣溫暖。可儘管如此，室內的氣氛卻顯得十分淤塞，…仿彿讓除夏妃以外的幾個人也嘗到了頭痛的滋味。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说是阴天，从窗外照射进的阳光却还是那样温暖。可尽管如此，室内的气氛却显得十分淤塞，…仿佛让除夏妃以外的几个人也尝到了头痛的滋味。
Indonesian (IDN): Meski cahaya dari jendela cukup hangat meski cuaca mendung, ada suasana suram di ruangan itu, ...yang mungkin menyebabkan sakit kepala bagi orang selain Natsuhi.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sebbene la luce splendeva attraverso la finestra nonostante il tempo nuvoloso, c'era un'atmosfera cupa nella stanza... che probabilmente causava emicranie ad altre persone oltre Natsuhi.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Nonostante il tempo nuvoloso, la luce filtrata dalla finestra portava con sé tepore, eppure all'interno della stanza l'aria ristagnava... e ciò faceva venire forti mal di testa anche agli altri, oltre a Natsuhi.
Turkish (TR): Bulutlu havaya rağmen pencereden giren ışık oldukça sıcaktı ama odada karanlık bir hava vardı, ...bu da muhtemelen Natsuhi dışında başka insanların da başını ağrıtmıştır.

Steam (ST): As if to sweep away that mood, Kyrie brightly made a suggestion to all present.
Umineko Project (UP): As if to brush away that mood, Kyrie brightly made a suggestion to all present.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As if to brush away that mood, Kyrie brightly made a suggestion to all present.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その空気を打ち払うかのように、霧江が明るく一同に提案する。

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Still, this black tea has a really lovely aroma. Let's drink it right away. In Japan, surely you couldn't find something like Leopold's black tea anywhere but Ginza, right?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Still, this black tea has a really lovely aroma. Let's drink it at once. I believe that in Japan, you can't buy something like Leopold's black tea anywhere but Ginza, right?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Still, this black tea has a really lovely aroma. Let's drink it at once. In Japan, surely you can't buy something like Leopold's black tea anywhere but Ginza, right?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「でも、本当に素敵な香りの紅茶ね。さっそく頂いてみましょうよ。レオポルドの紅茶なんて、日本じゃ確か銀座でしか買えなかったはずよ？」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「でも、本当に素敵な香りの紅茶ね。さっそく頂いてみましょうよ。レオポルドの紅茶なんて、日本じゃ確か銀座でしか買えなかったはずよ？」
Russian (RU): "И всё‐таки у этого чая просто бесподобный аромат. Давайте поскорее выпьем его. Полагаю, в Японии, кроме как в Гинзе, леопольдовский чёрный чай больше нигде не купишь, верно?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ainda assim, o aroma desse chá preto é maravilhoso. Vamos tomá‐lo logo. Acredito que, no Japão, você não possa comprar coisas como Chá Preto Leopold em qualquer lugar além de Ginza, certo?"
Vietnamese (VI): "Dù sao thì, trà đen này có mùi thơm tuyệt quá. Mời mọi người cùng uống ngay thôi. Chị nghe nói ở Nhật thì trà đen hiệu Leopold chỉ có thể mua ở Ginza, đúng không?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「不過，這紅茶的香氣真是不錯呢。大家也趕快嘗嘗吧。利奧波德的紅茶，在日本似乎只能在銀座買到喲？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不过，这红茶的香气真是不错呢。大家也赶快尝尝吧。利奥波德的红茶，在日本似乎只能在银座买到哟？」
Indonesian (IDN): "Teh hitam ini aromanya sangat harum. Mari kita minum sekarang. Sepertinya di Jepang, teh hitam Leopold hanya bisa dibeli di Ginza, ya?"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Comunque, questo tè nero ha davvero un ottimo aroma. Beviamolo subito. {n}In Giappone, sicuramente puoi comprare qualcosa come il tè nero di Leopold solamente a Ginza, vero?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Comunque, è un tè nero dall'aroma davvero ottimo. Beviamolo subito.{n}Di sicuro un tè nero di Leopold del genere in Giappone può essere comprato solo a Ginza, vero?"
Turkish (TR): "Yine de bu siyah çayın gerçekten hoş bir aroması var. Hadi soğumadan içelim. Sanırım Japonya'da Leopold'un siyah çayı gibi bir şeyi Ginza dışında hiçbir yerde satın alamazsınız, değil mi?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rudolf
Steam (ST): "Leave it for later, you two. Let's enjoy our "welcome drink"."
Umineko Project (UP): "Leave it for later, you two. Let them treat us to a "welcome drink" at least."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Leave it for later, you two. Let's enjoy our 'welcome drink'."
PC Japanese (JP): 「二人とも後にしろよ。ウェルカムドリンクくらいご馳走になろうぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「二人とも後にしろよ。ウェルカムドリンクくらいご馳走になろうぜ」
Russian (RU): "Оставьте это на потом. Давайте‐ка лучше насладимся 'приветственным напитком'."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Deixem isso para depois, vocês duas. Vamos deixar eles ofereceram nossas "bebidas de boas‐vindas"."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「你们两个等下再说吧。至少先享受一下迎宾茶水的款待吧。」
Indonesian (IDN): "Simpan untuk nanti, kalian berdua. Biarkan mereka menghidangkan "minuman selamat datang" dulu."

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Lasciatelo per dopo, voi due. Godiamoci questo drink di benvenuto."
Turkish (TR): "Siz ikiniz, bunu sonraya bırakın. En azından bize bir "hoş geldin içeceği" ikram etsinler."

Steam (ST): Rudolf gave a subtle signal with his eyes for them to sit down again. ...Kyrie and Rosa understood instantly and obediently returned to their seats.
Umineko Project (UP): Rudolf gave a subtle signal with his eyes for them to sit down again.{n}...Kyrie and Rosa understood instantly and obediently returned to their seats.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rudolf gave a subtle signal with his eyes for them to sit down again....Kyrie and Rosa understood instantly and obediently returned to their seats.
PC Japanese (JP): 留弗夫が席に戻れと、さりげなく目で合図をする。…霧江と楼座はすぐに理解し、大人しく無言で席に戻った。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 留弗夫が席に戻れと、さりげなく目で合図をする。{n}…霧江と楼座はすぐに理解し、大人しく無言で席に戻った。
Russian (RU): Рудольф незаметно подал им глазами знак сесть обратно.{n}...Кирие с Розой тотчас же уловили его и послушно сели.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 留弗夫回到座位，悄無聲息地向她倆遞了個眼神。{n}…霧江和樓座馬上就會意了，默默地回到自己的座位。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 留弗夫回到座位，悄无声息地向她俩递了个眼神。{n}…雾江和楼座马上就会意了，默默地回到自己的座位。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rudolf ritornò alla sua sedia e con disinvoltura diede loro uno sguardo significativo. ... Kyrie e Rosa capirono immediatamente e tornarono ubbidientemente ai loro posti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Con sguardo disinvolto, Rudolf diede loro un segnale di tornare alle loro sedie...Kirie e Rosa capirono immediatamente, e tornarono ai loro posti senza fiatare.
Turkish (TR): Rudolf tekrar oturmaları için gözleriyle ince bir işaret verdi.{n}...Kyrie ve Rosa hemen anladılar ve itaatkâr bir şekilde yerlerine döndüler.

Steam (ST): The initial greeting of the guests was complete, so it was time for them to be served some tea.
Umineko Project (UP): The guests had already been greeted, so it was time for some tea to be prepared for them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The guests had already been greeted, so it was time for some tea to be prepared for them.
PC Japanese (JP): 客人たちが挨拶に見えたのだから、すぐにお茶が振舞われるべきなのだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 客人たちが挨拶に見えたのだから、すぐにお茶が振舞われるべきなのだ。
Russian (RU): Гостей уже поприветствовали, поэтому настало время угостить их чаем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os convidados já haviam sido recebidos, portanto, já estava na hora de preparar o chá para eles.
Vietnamese (VI): Khách thì cũng đã chào rồi, vậy thì bây giờ là lúc trà nên được mang ra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 客人們都前來打招呼了，按理是應該立刻上茶的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 客人们都前来打招呼了，按理是应该立刻上茶的。
Indonesian (IDN): Tamu sudah disambut, sekarang waktunya teh disiapkan untuk mereka.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dato che gli ospiti erano stati ricevuti, bisognava subito preparare del tè per loro...
Turkish (TR): Misafirler çoktan karşılanmıştı, bu yüzden onlar için çay hazırlama zamanı gelmişti.

Steam (ST): ...It was embarrassing for the host that the tea was late, especially now that the guests were talking about making tea themselves.
Umineko Project (UP): ...That tea was late, and having the guests talk about making some themselves was an embarrassment for the host.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...That tea was late and having the guests talk about making some themselves was an embarrassment for the host.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …そのお茶のタイミングが遅れて、客人たちが自分たちでお茶を淹れようなどと言い出しては、ホストの顔は丸潰れだ。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...O chá estava atrasado, e ter os convidados falando sobre ir prepará‐lo era algo embaraçoso para os anfitriões.
Vietnamese (VI): ...Nhưng đợi mãi mà gia nhân vẫn chưa thấy đâu cả, và để khách tự bàn về việc rót trà thì thật mất mặt cho chủ nhà.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …若是錯過了上茶的時機，等到客人們自己說出倒茶，主人就顏面盡失了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …若是错过了上茶的时机，等到客人们自己说出倒茶，主人就颜面尽失了。
Indonesian (IDN): ...Teh itu terlambat, dan membuat tamu bicara tentang menyiapkan sendiri adalah aib bagi tuan rumah.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il fatto che il tè fosse talmente in ritardo, che gli ospiti avevano incominciato a dire di preparselo da soli, stava facendo fare una pessima figura ai padroni di casa.
Turkish (TR): ...Çay gecikmişti ve misafirlerin kendi çaylarını yapmaktan bahsetmeleri ev sahibi için utanç vericiydi.

Steam (ST): Natsuhi bit her lower lip, frustrated by the ineptitude of the servants who were late bringing in the tea.
Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi bit her lower lip, frustrated with the ineptitude of the servants who were taking too long to bring the tea.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Natsuhi bit her lower lip, frustrated with the ineptitude of the servants who were taking too long to bring the tea.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Seeing her face, Eva, without hesitation, started to giggle.

Umineko Project (UP): ......Of course, Shannon had no way of knowing what was taking place in the parlor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Of course, Shannon had no way of knowing what was taking place in the parlor.

Steam (ST): She came pushing a serving cart piled with tea cups. For no apparent reason, Natsuhi gave her a pained look, and Shannon couldn't help but flinch without knowing what she had done wrong.
Umineko Project (UP): As she came in pushing a dish cart piled with tea cups, Natsuhi gave her a pained look for no apparent reason, and Shannon couldn't help but flinch without knowing what she had done wrong.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She came pushing a dish cart piled with tea cups. For no apparent reason, Natsuhi gave her a pained look, and Shannon couldn't help but flinch without knowing what she had done wrong.
PC Japanese (JP): ティーカップを積んだ配膳ワゴンを押してやって来た、という、ただそれだけで夏妃に痛みを伴う眼差しを向けられて、意味もわからず萎縮するしかなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ティーカップを積んだ配膳ワゴンを押してやって来た、という、ただそれだけで夏妃に痛みを伴う眼差しを向けられて、意味もわからず萎縮するしかなかった。
Russian (RU): Она вошла, толкая сервировочную тележку, заставленную чашками с чаем. Без какой‐либо на то причины, Нацухи вдруг удостоила её страдальческим взглядом, и Шаннон, не понимающая, в чём же она провинилась, не смогла удержаться от того, чтобы вздрогнуть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela veio empurrando um carrinho com as xícaras de chá empilhadas, Natsuhi a observou com um olhar de pena por algum motivo, e Shannon não pôde fazer nada além de hesitar por não saber que havia feito algo errado.
Vietnamese (VI): Khi cô đẩy xe trà chất đầy những chiếc tách vào phòng, Natsuhi nhìn cô với một ánh mắt đau đớn mà không rõ lý do, khiến Shannon giật mình mà không hiểu mình làm gì sai.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她推著放滿茶杯的餐車走了進來。剛一進門就被夏妃那能刺痛人的眼神死死盯住，不明所以的她只好縮起了身子。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她推着放满茶杯的餐车走了进来。刚一进门就被夏妃那能刺痛人的眼神死死盯住，不明所以的她只好缩起了身子。
Indonesian (IDN): Saat dia masuk mendorong gerobak hidangan dengan cangkir teh, Natsuhi memberinya tatapan kesal tanpa alasan jelas, membuat Shannon kaget tanpa tahu kesalahannya.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Entrò spingendo un portavivande con alcune tazze da tè. Senza motivo apparente, Natsuhi le lanciò un'occhiataccia, e Shannon non poté fare altro che indietreggiare senza sapere cosa avesse fatto di sbagliato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Entrò spingendo un portavivande con sopra delle tazzine da tè, e senza motivo apparente, ricevette un'occhiataccia da Natsuhi, non potendo fare altro che tentennare senza sapere cosa avesse fatto.
Turkish (TR): Çay fincanlarıyla dolu bir servis arabasını iterek içeri girdiğinde, Natsuhi görünürde bir neden olmaksızın ona acı dolu bir bakış attı ve Shannon neyi yanlış yaptığını bilmeden irkilmekten kendini alamadı.

Steam (ST): "......E-Excuse me. Your tea is ready."
Umineko Project (UP): "......E‐excuse me. I shall prepare some tea for you."

Umineko Project (UP): "Oh, Shannon‐chan, it's been a while! You keep getting prettier every time I see you!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Oh, Shannon-chan, it's been a while! You keep getting prettier every time I see you!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Hideyoshi
Steam (ST): "Wahahahaha! Since I get to hear that poison tongue every day, I must be poison-proof myself by now! Eva, I don't mind when you use it on me, but you'd better hold back when talking to people who haven't built up a resistance! Wahahahaha!"
